2. Memoria RAM: 2. Memoria RAM (Capacitatea de memorie RAM suplimentara instalata in fiecare din serverele ofertate), Ofertele care vor preciza o capacitate a memoriei RAM instalate in serverul ofertat de 256 GB vor primi 0 puncte, intrucat se considera indeplinirea cerintei minime.
Ofertele care vor preciza o capacitate de memorie RAM instalate in serverul ofertat  mai mica de 256 GB vor fi declarate neconforme.
Pentru o cantitate suplimentara de 128 GB memorie RAM si mai mica de 256 GB  instalata in serverul ofertat – 15 puncte
Pentru o cantitate suplimentara de 256 GB memorie RAM si peste instalata in serverul ofertat – 25 puncte
Nu se vor puncta capacitatile de memorie RAM suplimentara inferioara capacitatii de 128 GB.
Celelalte specificatii minime de la cerinta 3.2.4.3 raman valabile, indiferent de capacitatea memoriei suplimentare ofertate.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
2. RAM memory: 2. RAM memory (The capacity of additional RAM installed in each of the offered servers). Offers that specify an installed RAM capacity in the offered server of 256 GB will receive 0 points, as this is considered to meet the minimum requirement.
Offers that specify an installed RAM capacity in the offered server lower than 256 GB will be declared non-compliant.
For an additional amount of 128 GB of RAM and less than 256 GB installed in the offered server – 15 points
For an additional amount of 256 GB of RAM and above installed in the offered server – 25 points
Additional RAM capacities below 128 GB will not be scored.
The other minimum specifications from requirement 3.2.4.3 remain valid, regardless of the offered additional memory capacity.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
3. Numarul de nuclee suplimentare: 3. Numarul de nuclee suplimentare pentru fiecare procesor instalat in fiecare server ofertat, Pentru procesor cu 24 nuclee se acorda 0 puncte intrucat se considera indeplinirea cerintei
Oferta care va include procesoare cu mai putin de 24 nuclee sau cu neindeplinirea criteriilor  aferente la caracteristicile procesoarelor, vor fi declarate neconforme.
Pentru procesoare cu un numar de nuclee intre 25 si 27 de nuclee se acorda 1 punct
Pentru procesoare cu un numar de nuclee intre 28 nuclee si maxim 31 de nuclee se acorda 10 puncte
Pentru procesoare cu 32 nuclee și peste se acorda 20 puncte
Celelalte specificatii minime de la cerinta 3.2.4.2 raman valabile, indiferent de numărul de nuclee suplimentare ofertate.
Toate procesoarele vor fi identice
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
3. Number of additional cores: Number of additional cores for each processor installed in each offered server. For a 24-core processor, 0 points are awarded since the requirement is considered fulfilled.
Any offer that includes processors with fewer than 24 cores or that fails to meet the criteria related to processor characteristics will be declared non-compliant.
For processors with a number of cores between 25 and 27, 1 point is awarded.
For processors with a number of cores between 28 and up to a maximum of 31, 10 points are awarded.
For processors with 32 cores and above, 20 points are awarded.
The other minimum specifications from requirement 3.2.4.2 remain applicable, regardless of the number of additional cores offered.
All processors shall be identical.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
4. Capacitate SSD: 4. Capacitate SSD (Capacitatea de SSD per fiecare disc suplimentara instalata in fiecare din serverele ofertate), Oferta care va preciza o capacitate SSD instalata per disc in serverul ofertat de 1.9 TB va primi 0 puncte, intrucat se considera indeplinirea cerintei minime.
Oferta care va preciza o capacitate SSD instalata per disc in serverul ofertat mai mica de 1.9 TB va fi declarata neconforma.
Pentru o cantitate suplimentara de 400 GB  si mai mica de 900 GB,  instalata pe fiecare disc, in serverul ofertat, se acorda 2,5 puncte
Pentru o cantitate suplimentara de 900 GB  si peste, instalata pe fiecare disc, in serverul ofertat – 5 puncte
Nu se vor puncta capacitatile SSD suplimentare per disc inferioara capacitatii de 400 GB.
Celelalte specificatii minime de la cerinta 3.2.4.5 raman valabile, indiferent de capacitatea de SSD suplimentara ofertata.
Toate SSD-urile vor fi identice.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
4. SSD capacity: 4. SSD capacity (the SSD capacity per each additional disk installed in each of the offered servers). An offer that specifies an SSD capacity installed per disk in the offered server of 1.9 TB will receive 0 points, since this is considered meeting the minimum requirement.
An offer that specifies an SSD capacity installed per disk in the offered server lower than 1.9 TB will be declared non-compliant.
For an additional amount of 400 GB and less than 900 GB, installed on each disk in the offered server, 2.5 points are awarded.
For an additional amount of 900 GB and above, installed on each disk in the offered server, 5 points.
Additional per-disk SSD capacities below 400 GB will not be scored.
The other minimum specifications from requirement 3.2.4.5 remain valid, regardless of the additional SSD capacity offered.
All SSDs will be identical.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
5. Garantia sistemului: 5. Garantia sistemului, Pentru o garantie acordata intregului sistem de 3 ani se acordă 0 puncte intrucat se considera indeplinirea cerintei minime.
Oferta care va preciza o durata de garantie acordata intregului sistem mai mica de 3 ani va fi declarata neconforma.
Oferta care va include un an de garantie suplimentara si mai mult (pentru intregul sistem), va primi 10 puncte.
Celelalte specificatii minime de la cerinta 6 raman valabile, indiferent de termenul de garantie ofertat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
5. System warranty: 5. System warranty, For a warranty granted to the entire system of 3 years, 0 points are awarded since it is considered the fulfillment of the minimum requirement.
An offer that specifies a warranty period granted to the entire system of less than 3 years will be declared non-compliant.
An offer that includes one additional year of warranty or more (for the entire system) will receive 10 points.
The other minimum specifications from requirement 6 remain valid, regardless of the warranty period offered.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest among the prices receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Termenul de garanție: Termenul de garanție cel mai mare dar nu mai mic de 60 de luni, a) - pentru cel mai mare termen de garanție se acordă punctajul maxim alocat
b) – pentru celelate termene ofértate punctajul T(n) se calculează proporțional astfel:
T(n) = ( termen minim ofertat/termen n) x punctaj maxim alocat
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Warranty period: The longest warranty period, but not less than 60 months. a) For the longest warranty period, the maximum allocated score is awarded. b) For the other offered periods, the score T(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: T(n) = (minimum offered period / period n) × maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. Scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated points; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (minimum offered price / price n) x maximum allocated points.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (lowest offered price / price n) × maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Garantie extinsa aplicabila display-ul interactiv -toate modelele: Componenta tehnica, Pentru oferta/ofertele cu cea mai mare durata a termenului de garantie (exprimata in Luni), pentru Display-ului Interactiv, se acordă punctajul maxim alocat factorului de evaluare, respectiv 18 puncte. Pentru oferta/ofertele avand durata termenului de garantie egala cu specificatia (durata) minima ceruta (36 luni), se vor acorda 0 puncte. Toate ofertele avand durata termenului de garantie mai mica decat specificatia minima ceruta (36 luni), vor fi declarate neconforme. Durata termenului maxim de garantie ofertat nu poate depasi 60 luni.
Pentru celelalte oferte admisibile punctajul P(n) se calculează proporțional, astfel:
P(n)= (garantia <in luni> extinsa ofertata) / (garantia <in luni> extinsa maxima primita) x 18 puncte
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Extended warranty applicable to the interactive display - all models: Technical component. For the offer(s) with the longest warranty period (expressed in months) for the Interactive Display, the maximum score allocated to the evaluation factor, namely 18 points, is awarded. For offer(s) having a warranty period equal to the minimum required specification (36 months), 0 points will be awarded. All offers having a warranty period shorter than the minimum required specification (36 months) will be declared non-compliant. The maximum offered warranty period cannot exceed 60 months.
For the other admissible offers, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows:
P(n) = (extended warranty <in months> offered) / (maximum extended warranty <in months> received) x 18 points

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Capacitatea de stocare (built-in) al Display-ului Interactiv (Tabla Interactiva) (exprimata in GB) – toate modelele: Componenta tehnica, Pentru oferta/ofertele cu cea mai mare valoare a spatiului de stocare built-in (exprimat in GB) al display-ului interactiv se acordă punctajul maxim alocat factorului de evaluare, respectiv 10 puncte. Pentru oferta/ofertele avand valoarea spatiului de stocare (built-in) egala cu specificatia (valoarea) minima ceruta (64 GB), se vor acorda 0 puncte. Toate ofertele avand valoarea spatiului de stocare (built-in) mai mica decat specificatia minima ceruta (64GB), vor fi declarate neconforme.
Pentru celelalte oferte admisibile punctajul P(n) se calculează proporțional, astfel:
P(n)= ((Valoare ofertată pentru spatiul de stocare – valoarea minima ceruta)/ (Valoarea maxima ofertata pentru spatiul de stocare – valoarea minima ceruta)) x 10 puncte.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Built-in storage capacity of the Interactive Display (Interactive Whiteboard) (expressed in GB) – all models: Technical component. For the offer(s) with the highest value of the built-in storage space (expressed in GB) of the interactive display, the maximum score allocated to the evaluation factor will be awarded, namely 10 points. For the offer(s) having the value of the built-in storage space equal to the minimum specification required (64 GB), 0 points will be awarded. All offers having a value of the built-in storage space lower than the minimum specification required (64 GB) will be declared non-compliant.
For the other admissible offers, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows:
P(n) = ((Offered value for storage space – minimum required value) / (Maximum offered value for storage space – minimum required value)) x 10 points.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Prelungirea duratei de viata a produselor. Disponibilitate continua a pieselor de schimb: Componenta tehnica, Ofertantul trebuie sa garanteze disponibilitatea pieselor de schimb si accesoriilor, cel putin pentru : Panel(panou afisaj), Sursa de Alimentare, Placa de Baza (placa de comanda centrala), Placa cu Porturi Intrari-Iesiri/Interfata (daca este separata de placa de baza), Senzor CMOS, Sisteme de Iluminare LED (la produsele la care se aplica), Telecomenzi, timp de cel putin 2 ani de la data expirarii garantiei ofertate. Ofertantul va depune o documentatie, pentru toate produsele ofertate, care trebuie sa contina : 1). Declaratia conform careia piesele de schimb solicitate vor fi disponibile timp de 2 ani de la expirarea garantiei ofertate, 2). Lista de preturi cu piese de schimb si accesorii pentru fiecare produs ofertat (pentru toate produsele care contin una sau mai multe dintre piesele de schimb enumerate mai sus, evidentiate pe coduri si producatori), precum si costurile orientative ale fortei de munca necesare pentru inlocuire acestora.
Pentru toate ofertele care contin documentatia completa, descrisa mai sus, se va acorda punctajul maxim alocat, respectiv 5 puncte.
Pentru celelalte oferte se vor acorda 0 puncte.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Extending the lifespan of products. Continuous availability of spare parts: Technical component, the Tenderer must guarantee the availability of spare parts and accessories at least for: Panel (display panel), Power Supply, Main Board (central control board), Input–Output Ports/Interface Board (if separate from the main board), CMOS Sensor, LED Lighting Systems (for products where applicable), Remote Controls, for at least 2 years from the expiry date of the offered warranty. The Tenderer shall submit documentation, for all products offered, which must include: 1) A declaration stating that the requested spare parts will be available for 2 years from the expiry of the offered warranty; 2) A price list of spare parts and accessories for each product offered (for all products that contain one or more of the spare parts listed above, highlighted by codes and manufacturers), as well as indicative labor costs required for their replacement.
For all bids that include the complete documentation described above, the maximum allocated score will be awarded, namely 5 points.
For the other bids, 0 points will be awarded.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Numar de puncte de touch valabile pentru sistemul de operare cu care se livreaza Display-ul Interactiv (Tabla Interactiva) – toate modelele: Componenta tehnica, Pentru oferta/ofertele cu cea mai mare valoare a numarului de puncte de touch pentru sistemul de operare primar (instalat) al display-ului interactiv se acordă punctajul maxim alocat factorului de evaluare, respectiv 15 puncte. Pentru oferta/ofertele avand numarul de puncte de touch pentru sistemul de operare primar (instalat) egal cu specificatia (valoarea) minima ceruta (40 puncte touch valabile pentru sistemul de operare instalat – cel cu care se livreaza Display-ul Interactiv), se vor acorda 0 puncte. Toate ofertele avand numarul de puncte de touch pentru sistemul de operare primar (instalat) mai mic decat specificatia minima ceruta (40 puncte touch valabile pentru sistemul de operare instalat – cel cu care se livreaza Display-ul Interactiv), vor fi declarate neconforme.
Pentru celelalte oferte admisibile punctajul P(n) se calculează proporțional, astfel:
P(n)= ((Valoare ofertată pentru numarului de puncte de touch pentru sistemul de operare primar (instalat) al display-ului interactiv – valoarea minima ceruta)/ (Valoarea maxima ofertata pentru numarului de puncte de touch pentru sistemul de operare primar (instalat) al display-ului interactiv – valoarea minima ceruta)) x 15 puncte
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Number of valid touch points for the operating system with which the Interactive Display (Interactive Board) is delivered – all models: Technical component. For the offer(s) with the highest value for the number of touch points for the primary (installed) operating system of the interactive display, the maximum score allocated to the evaluation factor will be awarded, namely 15 points. For the offer(s) having the number of touch points for the primary (installed) operating system equal to the minimum required specification (40 valid touch points for the installed operating system – the one with which the Interactive Display is delivered), 0 points will be awarded. All offers with the number of touch points for the primary (installed) operating system lower than the minimum required specification (40 valid touch points for the installed operating system – the one with which the Interactive Display is delivered) will be declared non-compliant.
For the other admissible offers, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows:
P(n) = ((Offered value for the number of touch points for the primary (installed) operating system of the interactive display – the minimum required value) / (Maximum offered value for the number of touch points for the primary (installed) operating system of the interactive display – the minimum required value)) x 15 points

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Timpul de raspuns al Display-ului Interactiv (Tabla Interactiva) -  (exprimat in ms) – toate modelele: Componenta tehnica, Pentru oferta/ofertele cu cea mai mica valoare a timpului de raspuns (exprimata in ms) a display-ului interactiv se acordă punctajul maxim alocat factorului de evaluare, respectiv 5 puncte. Pentru oferta/ofertele avand valoarea timpului de raspuns egala cu specificatia (valoarea) maxima ceruta (8 ms), se vor acorda 0 puncte. Toate ofertele avand valoarea timpului de raspuns mai mare decat specificatia maxima ceruta (8ms), vor fi declarate neconforme.
Pentru celelalte oferte admisibile punctajul P(n) se calculează proporțional, astfel:
P(n)= ((Valoarea maxima sdmisa - valoare ofertată pentru timpul de raspuns)/ (Valoarea maxima admisa - valoarea minima ofertata pentru timpul de raspuns)) x 5 puncte.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Response time of the Interactive Display (Interactive Whiteboard) (expressed in ms) – all models: Technical component. For the offer(s) with the lowest response time (in ms) of the interactive display, the maximum score allocated to the evaluation factor is awarded, namely 5 points. For the offer(s) with a response time equal to the maximum required specification (8 ms), 0 points will be awarded. All offers with a response time greater than the maximum required specification (8 ms) will be declared non-compliant. For the other admissible offers, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = ((Maximum allowed value − offered value for the response time) / (Maximum allowed value − minimum offered value for the response time)) × 5 points.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Functie de securitate si functionalitate disponibila la Telecomanda Display-ului Interactiv (Tabla Interactiva) – toate modelele: Componenta tehnica, Este posibil ca o telecomanda sa poate sa fie restrictionata astfel incat sa functioneze doar cu un singur display (tabla interactiva)?
Pentru ofertele care contin aceasta functionalitate a telecomenzii, se va acorda punctajul maxim alocat, respectiv 5 puncte.
Pentru celelalte oferte se vor acorda 0 puncte
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Security and functionality feature available on the Interactive Display Remote Control (Interactive Whiteboard) – all models: Technical component. Is it possible for a remote control to be restricted so that it works only with a single display (interactive whiteboard)? For offers that include this remote control functionality, the maximum allocated score will be awarded, namely 5 points. For the other offers, 0 points will be awarded.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Numarul de megapixeli ai senzorului CMOS din componenta scanerului portabil (exprimat in megapixeli): Componenta tehnica, Pentru oferta/ofertele cu cea mai mare valoare a numarului de megapixeli al scanerului portabil, se acordă punctajul maxim alocat factorului de evaluare, respectiv 12 puncte. Pentru oferta/ofertele avand valoarea numarului de megapixeli egal cu specificatia (valoarea) minima ceruta (18 Mpixeli), se vor acorda 0 puncte. Toate ofertele avand valoarea numarului de megapixeli mai mica decat specificatia minima ceruta (18 Mpixeli), vor fi declarate neconforme.
Pentru celelalte oferte admisibile punctajul P(n) se calculează proporțional, astfel:
P(n)= ((Valoare ofertată pentru numarul de megapixeli – valoarea minima ceruta)/ (Valoarea maxima ofertata pentru numarul de megapixeli – valoarea minima ceruta)) x 12 puncte.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Number of megapixels of the CMOS sensor in the portable scanner component (expressed in megapixels): Technical component. For the offer(s) with the highest number of megapixels of the portable scanner, the maximum score allocated to the evaluation factor is awarded, namely 12 points. For offer(s) having the number of megapixels equal to the minimum specification (required value) (18 megapixels), 0 points will be awarded. All offers having a number of megapixels lower than the minimum required specification (18 megapixels) will be declared non-compliant.
For the other admissible offers, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows:
P(n) = ((Offered value for the number of megapixels – the minimum required value) / (Maximum offered value for the number of megapixels – the minimum required value)) x 12 points.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price is awarded the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Punctaj factor tehnic 1 (FT1)– Asigurarea de consumabile: Pentru tipărirea unui număr de pagini superior numărului de pagini minim solicitat, conform specificațiilor tehnice, pentru fiecare (*) dintre: Specificație tehnică 1 @ Linie tehnologică, specificație tehnicp 2 @ Multifuncțional color și Specificație tehnică 3 @ Multifuncțional monocrom  – maximum, Punctajul acordat pentru respectarea cerinţei minime, respectiv, consumabile pentru tipărirea numărului minim de pagini solicitat, conform specificațiilor tehnice, respectiv: Linie tehnologică = 850.000 pagini, Multifunctional color = 580.000 pagini și Multifunctional monocrom = 510.000 pagini - cerințe minimale ale Caietului de sarcini: 0 puncte; Punctajul acordat pentru consumabile pentru tipărirea unui număr de pagini cu 50% mai mult față de numărului de pagini minim solicitat, conform specificațiilor tehnice, respectiv: Linie tehnologică = 1.275.000 pagini, Multifunctional color - 870.000 pagini și Multifunctional monocrom = 765.000 pagini: 10 puncte;  Punctajul acordat pentru consumabile pentru tipărirea unui număr de pagini dublu (100%) numărului de pagini minim solicitat, conform specificațiilor tehnice, respectiv: Linie tehnologică = 1.700.000 pagini, Multifunctional color = 1.160.000 pagini și Multifunctional monocrom = 1.020.000 pagini sau mai mult: 20 puncte
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Technical factor score 1 (FT1) – Provision of consumables: For printing a number of pages greater than the minimum number of pages requested, according to the technical specifications, for each (*) of: Technical Specification 1 @ Technological line, Technical Specification 2 @ Color multifunctional, and Technical Specification 3 @ Monochrome multifunctional. Scoring: The score awarded for meeting the minimum requirement, namely consumables for printing the minimum number of pages requested, according to the technical specifications, namely: Technological line = 850,000 pages, Color multifunctional = 580,000 pages, and Monochrome multifunctional = 510,000 pages — minimum requirements of the Terms of Reference: 0 points; The score awarded for consumables for printing a number of pages 50% higher than the minimum number of pages requested, according to the technical specifications, namely: Technological line = 1,275,000 pages, Color multifunctional = 870,000 pages, and Monochrome multifunctional = 765,000 pages: 10 points; The score awarded for consumables for printing a number of pages double (100%) the minimum number of pages requested, according to the technical specifications, namely: Technological line = 1,700,000 pages, Color multifunctional = 1,160,000 pages, and Monochrome multifunctional = 1,020,000 pages or more: 20 points.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component, scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price is awarded the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Garanţia suplimentară acordată lucrărilor: Componenta tehnica-5 calitativa, Algoritm de calcul: Se vor acorda maxim 15 puncte pentru garanție suplimentară (peste perioada minimă solicitată în caietul de sarcini care este de 3 ani), după cum urmează: Pentru 1 (un) an de garantie suplimentara se acorda punctajul de 5 puncte; Pentru 2 (doi) ani de garantie suplimentara se acorda punctajul de 10 puncte; Pentru 3 (trei) sau mai multi ani de garantie suplimentara se acorda punctajul maxim de 15 puncte; Pentru 0 ani acordate garantie suplimentara nu se aloca punctaj, ( punctaj = 0 ), oferta fiind declarata conformă.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Additional warranty granted for the works: Technical component—qualitative criterion 5. Calculation algorithm: A maximum of 15 points will be awarded for the additional warranty (beyond the minimum period requested in the specifications, which is 3 years), as follows: For 1 (one) year of additional warranty, 5 points will be awarded; For 2 (two) years of additional warranty, 10 points will be awarded; For 3 (three) or more years of additional warranty, the maximum score of 15 points will be awarded; For 0 years of additional warranty granted, no points are allocated (score = 0), the offer being declared compliant.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Gestionarea deșeurilor de pe șantier: Componenta tehnica-6 ecologica, Punctajul se acorda astfel: - Pentru oferta cu cel mai mare numar de măsuri concrete propuse pentru reducerea cantității de deșeuri produse în timpul execuției lucrărilor de construcție, se acorda punctajul maxim alocat, respectiv 10 puncte; - Petru celelalte oferte punctajul se calculeaza proportional astfel: P puncte (n) =P masuri (n)/P masuri (max) x 10 (punctaj maxim alocat), unde: P puncte (n) - punctele obtinute de oferta admisibila evaluata pentru factorul de evaluare “Gestionarea deșeurilor de pe șantier”; P masuri (n) - numarul de măsuri concrete propuse pentru reducerea cantității de deșeuri produse în timpul execuției lucrărilor de construcție si documentate in cadrul ofertei admisibile aflata in evaluare; P masuri (max) - cel mai mare numar de măsuri concrete propuse pentru reducerea cantității de deșeuri produse în timpul execuției lucrărilor de construcție si documentate in cadrul ofertelor admisibile. Oferta fara masuri suplimentare concrete propuse pentru reducerea cantității de deșeuri, nu se puncteaza ( punctaj = 0 ), oferta fiind declarata conformă. Aplicarea factorului de evaluare se va realiza numai pentru masurile propuse suplimentar fata de cerintele minime din Caietul de sarcini, precizate la Cap.5.3 Rezultate ce trebuie obținute de Contractant, pct.2. Executie. Puncatjul obtinut de ofertant (P) se obtine prin insumarea punctajului la oferta financiara (Pf) si a punctajelor la oferta tehnica (Pt) (experienta profesionala; garantia suplimentara si gestionarea deseurilor). P=Pf+Pt
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Site waste management: Technical component – ecological (item 6). Scoring is awarded as follows: - For the offer with the highest number of concrete measures proposed to reduce the amount of waste produced during the execution of construction works, the maximum allocated score is awarded, namely 10 points; - For the other offers, the score is calculated proportionally as follows: P points (n) = P measures (n) / P measures (max) × 10 (maximum allocated score), where: P points (n) – the points obtained by the admissible offer evaluated for the evaluation factor “Site waste management”; P measures (n) – the number of concrete measures proposed to reduce the amount of waste produced during the execution of construction works and documented in the admissible offer under evaluation; P measures (max) – the highest number of concrete measures proposed to reduce the amount of waste produced during the execution of construction works and documented in the admissible offers. An offer without additional concrete measures proposed to reduce the quantity of waste is not scored (score = 0), the offer being declared compliant. The evaluation factor will be applied only to measures proposed in addition to the minimum requirements in the Specifications, specified in Chapter 5.3 Results to be achieved by the Contractor, point 2. Execution. The score obtained by the tenderer (P) is obtained by summing the score for the financial offer (Pf) and the scores for the technical offer (Pt) (professional experience; additional warranty; and waste management). P = Pf + Pt.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The score is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Termenul de livrare: Termenul de livrare - Autoritatea Contractanta acorda punctaj pentru ofertele care ofera un termen de livrare mai mic de 30 zile, termenul de livrare maxim acceptat (respectiv livrare, instalarii si intruire personal), stabilit prin caietul de sarcini., Punctajul pentru factorul de evaluare „Termenul de livrare” propus în cadrul ofertei, se acordă astfel: 
a) pentru cel mai scăzut termen de livrare se acordă punctajul maxim alocat factorului de evaluare respectiv; 
b) pentru alt termen decât cel prevăzut la lit. a) se acordă punctajul astfel: P(n) = (Termen de livrare minim/termen de livrare (n)) x punctajul maxim alocat. 
Ofertele cu un termen de livrare mai mare de 30 zile vor fi considerate neconforme. Termenul minim de livrare care se punctează este de 15 zile. Pentru ofertele cu un termen de livrare mai mic decât termenul minim (15 zile), nu se acordă punctaj suplimentar.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Delivery time: Delivery time - The Contracting Authority awards points for offers that provide a delivery time of less than 30 days, the maximum accepted delivery time (namely delivery, installation and staff training), as set out in the specifications. The scoring for the evaluation factor “Delivery time” proposed within the offer is awarded as follows: 
a) for the lowest delivery time, the maximum score allocated to the respective evaluation factor is awarded; 
b) for any other delivery time than that provided at letter a), the score is awarded as follows: P(n) = (Minimum delivery time / delivery time (n)) × the maximum allocated score. 
Offers with a delivery time greater than 30 days will be considered non-compliant. The minimum delivery time that is scored is 15 days. For offers with a delivery time shorter than the minimum (15 days), no additional points are awarded.

2. Calificare și experiența profesionala a personalului desemnat pt executarea contractului (experți cheie propuși) pt realizarea activităților: Componenta tehnică, CCalificare și experiența profesionala a personalului desemnat pt executarea contractului (experți cheie propuși) pt realizarea activităților, din care: 1) Experiență Manager proiect-12 puncte; 2) Experiență Șef Echipă proiectare - 11 puncte; 3) Experiență Expert proiectare structuri de rezistenta - construcții civile istorice - 9 puncte.

2. Qualification and professional experience of the personnel designated for execution of the contract (proposed key experts) for carrying out the activities: Technical component, Qualification and professional experience of the personnel designated for execution of the contract (proposed key experts) for carrying out the activities, of which: 1) Experience of Project Manager – 12 points; 2) Experience of Design Team Leader – 11 points; 3) Experience of Expert in structural design (load‑bearing structures) – historical civil constructions – 9 points.
Calculation algorithm: The details of the evaluation factor are found in Annex no. 2 to the Instructions to bidders – Data Sheet.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
4. Perioada de garanţie acordată lucrărilor executate: Componenta tehnică, Detalierea factorului de evaluare se regăsește in Anexa nr. 2 la Instrucț către ofertanți – Fișa de date.Punctajul obţinut pentru fiecare subfactor de evaluare va fi obținut utilizând media ponderată a fiecărui subfactor de evaluare în totalul factorului de evaluare „Componenta tehnică”. Punctele acordate pentru factorul de evaluare „Componenta tehnică" în punctajul total vor fi calculate după cum urmează: 
P tehnic(n) = Punctele obţinute pentru 2.1. ”Calificarea şi experienţa profesională a personalului desemnat pentru exercitarea contractului (experţii cheie propuşi) pentru realizarea activităţilor în cadrul contractului” cu subcategoriile aferente (2.1.1÷2.1.3) + Punctele obţinute pentru 2.2. ”Demonstrarea unei abordări şi a unei metodologii corespunzătoare pentru realizarea activităţilor şi obţinerea rezultatelor în cadrul contractului” + Punctele obţinute pentru 2.3. ”Perioada de garanţie acordată lucrărilor executate”.
Punctajul total obţinut va fi determinat după cum urmează: punctajul acordat pentru factorul de evaluare 1. Preţ (maximum 40 puncte) + punctajul acordat pentru factorul de evaluare 2. Componenta tehnică (maximum 60 puncte) = maxim 100 de puncte. Clasamentul ofertelor va fi determinat pe baza punctajului total. Pe baza metodei de calcul de mai sus, ofertantul care are cel mai mare punctaj total va fi declarat câştigător.
Modul de departajare a ofertelor cu punctaj egal: ÎÎn cazul în care două sau mai multe oferte sunt clasate pe primul loc, cu punctaje egale, în vederea departajării acestora, EC va alege, oferta cu cel mai mare punctaj obla factorul de eval „Prețul ofertei”. Dacă egalitatea se menţine, departajarea se va face având în vedere punctajul obt la factorul de eval tehnică în ordinea: 1. Componenta tehn 2-Fact 2.1- Calif şi experienţa prof a pers desemnat pt exec contractului (experţii cheie propuşi) pt realiz activităţilor în cadrul contr 2; Componenta tehn 2-Factorul 2.2- Demonstrarea unei abordări şi a unei metodologii coresp pt realiz activităţilor şi obţ rez în cadrul contr; 3. Componenta tehn 3-Factorul 2.3- Pd de garanţie acordată lucrărilor executate.
Dacă egalitatea se menţine, EC va solicita clarificări în SEAP, în sensul reofertării prețurilor, utiliz facilitatea de reofertare din sistem disp în etapa DELIBERARE. Ofertanții care primesc această solicitare vor putea reoferta prețul prin depunerea unui nou docum, în format electronic, cu semnătură electronică extinsă, bazată pe un certificat calificat, eliberat de un furnizor de servicii de certificare acreditat în cond legii și încărcate în SEAP, ca răspuns la solicitarea de clarif transmisă de EC în SEAP. Clasamentul final se va face luând în considerare prețul reofertat şi oferta câştigătoare va fi desemnată cea care va prezenta preţul cel mai scăzut. Noua propunere financiară va fi depusă doar și numai în urma solicitării EC.
Detalierea factorilor de evaluare se regăsește in Anexa nr. 2.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
4. Warranty period granted for the executed works: Technical component. The breakdown of the evaluation factor is found in Annex no. 2 to the Instructions to bidders – Data Sheet. The score obtained for each evaluation sub-factor will be determined using the weighted average of each sub-factor within the overall “Technical component” evaluation factor. The points awarded for the “Technical component” evaluation factor in the total score will be calculated as follows:
Technical P(n) = Points obtained for 2.1 “Qualification and professional experience of the personnel designated for performance of the contract (the proposed key experts) for carrying out the activities under the contract” with the related subcategories (2.1.1–2.1.3) + Points obtained for 2.2 “Demonstration of an appropriate approach and methodology for carrying out the activities and achieving the results under the contract” + Points obtained for 2.3 “Warranty period granted for the executed works.”
The total score obtained will be determined as follows: the score awarded for evaluation factor 1. Price (maximum 40 points) + the score awarded for evaluation factor 2. Technical component (maximum 60 points) = a maximum of 100 points. The ranking of tenders will be determined based on the total score. Based on the above calculation method, the tenderer with the highest total score will be declared the winner.
Method of breaking ties between tenders with equal scores: If two or more tenders are ranked first with equal scores, for the purpose of breaking the tie, the EC will choose the offer with the highest score for the “Offer price” evaluation factor. If the tie persists, the tie-break will be made by considering the score obtained for the technical evaluation factor in the following order: 1. Technical component 2 – Factor 2.1 – Qualification and professional experience of the personnel designated for performance of the contract (the proposed key experts) for carrying out the activities under the contract; 2. Technical component 2 – Factor 2.2 – Demonstration of an appropriate approach and methodology for carrying out the activities and achieving the results under the contract; 3. Technical component 3 – Factor 2.3 – Warranty period granted for the executed works.
If the tie still persists, the EC will request clarifications in SEAP, in the sense of re-bidding the prices, using the re-bidding facility available in the system at the DELIBERATION stage. Tenderers who receive this request will be able to re-bid the price by submitting a new document, in electronic format, with an extended electronic signature based on a qualified certificate issued by an accredited certification service provider under the law, and uploading it in SEAP, in response to the request for clarifications sent by the EC in SEAP. The final ranking will be made taking into account the re-bid price, and the winning offer will be the one that presents the lowest price. The new financial proposal will be submitted only and exclusively following the EC’s request.
The detailed breakdown of the evaluation factors is found in Annex no. 2.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
3. Garantie acordata (minim 24 de luni).: Componenta tehnica:, Punctaj maxim factor: 10 puncte.
Algoritm de calcul:
Pgₓ= (Goₓ / Gmax) x Pgmax. 
Descriere aplicare algoritm de aplicare:
Garantia acordata de ofertant va fi corelata proportional cu valorile si prevederile de la pct 3.3 din Caietul de sarcini, adica 24 luni.
Gmax= Oferta cu Garantia cea mai extinsa (luni) pentru care se acorda  punctajul maxim de 10 puncte;
Pgmax =Punctaj maxim adica 10 puncte;
Goₓ=garantia oferta ,,x’’( oferta care se evalueaza);
Pgₓ=punctaj garantie pentru oferta ,,x’’rezultat dupa aplicare algoritm calcul.
Pentru celelalte oferte punctajul se calculează ponderat în comparație cu cea mai bună ofertă.
Ofertele cu o garantie sub garantia minima acceptata de 24 de luni vor fi declarate neconforme.

Criteriul de adjudecare oferta: Punctaj total obtinut de ofertant:
Ptₓ= punctaj total pentru oferta ,,x’’
Algoritm de calcul:
Ptₓ= Pvₓ + Ppx + Psx + Pgₓ
Se stabileste clasamentul ofertelor prin ordonarea descrescatoare a punctajelor obtinute. 
Se declara castigatoare oferta cu Ptₓ maxim (oferta cu punctajul total cel mai mare).
In cazul in care vor exista 2 sau mai multe oferte cu punctaje egale criteriul de departajare va fi pretul cel mai scazut (valoarea in lei  fara tva ofertata in cadrul propunerii financiare).
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
3. Warranty provided (minimum 24 months). Technical component. Maximum points for factor: 10 points.
Calculation algorithm:
Pgₓ = (Goₓ / Gmax) x Pgmax.
Description of application of the algorithm:
The warranty provided by the tenderer will be correlated proportionally with the values and provisions from point 3.3 of the Terms of Reference, namely 24 months.
Gmax = The offer with the longest warranty (months), for which the maximum score of 10 points is awarded;
Pgmax = Maximum score, i.e., 10 points;
Goₓ = warranty of offer “x” (the offer being evaluated);
Pgₓ = warranty score for offer “x” resulting after applying the calculation algorithm.
For the other offers, the score is calculated weighted in comparison with the best offer.
Offers with a warranty below the minimum accepted warranty of 24 months will be declared non-compliant.

Award criterion for the offer: Total score obtained by the tenderer:
Ptₓ = total score for offer “x”
Calculation algorithm:
Ptₓ = Pvₓ + Ppx + Psx + Pgₓ
The ranking of the offers is established by ordering the obtained scores in descending order.
The offer with the maximum Ptₓ (the offer with the highest total score) is declared the winner.
If there are two or more offers with equal scores, the tie-breaker criterion will be the lowest price (the amount in lei without VAT offered in the financial proposal).

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. Points are awarded as follows: a) The lowest price is awarded the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

Carrying out a stage of production in the development region where the contracting authority has its headquarters: Technical component, Calculation algorithm: - For carrying out a stage of production in the development region where the contracting authority has its headquarters, 30 points are awarded; - For carrying out a stage of production in development regions in the immediate vicinity of the development region where the contracting authority has its headquarters, 15 points are awarded; - For carrying out a stage of production on the territory of Romania, 10 points are awarded; - For carrying out a stage of production in the intra-Community area, 5 points are awarded.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Lanţul de aprovizionare: Componenta tehnica, Algoritm de calcul: - Fără niciun intermediar unde sunt incluşi producători, procesatori, asociaţii de producători, respectiv organizaţii de producători, grupuri de producători, cooperative se acordă 30 de puncte;
- Atunci când există un intermediar se acordă 20 puncte;
- Pentru doi sau mai mulţi intermediari se acordă 10 puncte.
Notă:
Operatorul economic care asigură pentru ofertant serviciile de transport al produselor, accesorii furnizării, nu va fi considerat intermediar, deoarece suntem în prezenţa unei singure oferte şi a unui singur transfer al dreptului de proprietate asupra produselor, respectiv de la ofertant la autoritatea contractantă achizitoare, transportatorul în cauză facturând către ofertant doar serviciile de transport.
Totodată, menţionăm, pentru buna înţelegere a modalităţii de acordare a punctajului aferent factorilor tehnici, faptul că nu se urmăreşte punctarea cantităţii de produse aduse de producător, respectiv de intermediar, ci doar existenţa sau nu a unui intermediar în lanţul de aprovizionare.
Clasamentul pe baza căruia se stabileşte oferta câştigătoare se întocmeşte în ordinea de-screscătoare a punctajului total (P_total) obţinut prin însumarea punctajelor aferente factorului preţ şi a celor privind calitatea, potrivit formulei Ptotal= Pfin + PEPRD + PLA unde:
Pfin = punctajul pentru factorul de evaluare „Pretul ofertei”
PEPRD = punctajul alocat pentru factorul de evaluare „Realizarea unei etape de productie in regi- unea de dezvoltare unde isi are sediul autoritatea contractanta”
PLA = punctajul alocat pentru factorul de evaluare „Lanţul de aprovizionare”
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Supply chain: Technical component, Calculation algorithm:
- Without any intermediary—i.e., where the supply chain includes producers, processors, producer associations/organizations, producer groups, cooperatives—30 points are awarded;
- When there is one intermediary, 20 points are awarded;
- For two or more intermediaries, 10 points are awarded.
Note:
The economic operator that provides transport services for the products (as ancillary to supply) for the tenderer will not be considered an intermediary, because there is a single offer and a single transfer of ownership of the products, namely from the tenderer to the contracting authority purchaser; the transport operator in question invoices only the transport services to the tenderer.
We also mention, for a proper understanding of how the scores related to the technical factors are awarded, that the aim is not to score the quantity of products brought by the producer or by the intermediary, but only the existence or not of an intermediary in the supply chain.
The ranking on the basis of which the winning offer is established is drawn up in descending order of the total score (P_total) obtained by adding the scores related to the price factor and those regarding quality, according to the formula P_total = P_fin + P_EPRD + P_LA, where:
P_fin = score for the evaluation factor “Offer price”
P_EPRD = score allocated for the evaluation factor “Carrying out a production stage in the development region where the contracting authority has its headquarters”
P_LA = score allocated for the evaluation factor “Supply chain”
