Calificativ: Bine/Adecvat – Punctaj acordat 7 puncte Ofertantul trateaza toate elementele detaliate in cadrul acestui subfactor, ce reflecta ca: resursele indicate sunt partial corelate cu complexitatea activitatilor si subactivitatilor propuse din cadrul contractului, demonstrand ca planul de lucru este corelat partial cu Metodologia de execute. Resursele umane sunt structurate, incluzand personal calificat pentru activitatile critice Planificarea execuţiei este bine descrisa, incluzand soluţii tehnice adecvate pentru lucrarile de consolidare. Metodologia de execute este sumar descrisa, fara detalii suplimentare. Responsabilitaţile echipei sunt prezentate la un nivel general, fara a detalia coordonarea sau interacţiunea membrilor. Graficul de executie este prezentat, dar nu detaliaza suficient corelarea resurselor cu activitatile. Ofertantul demonstreaza ca poate implementa contractul, dar cu riscuri crescute de intarzieri sau neconformita. Acest nivel este acordat ofertanţilor care indeplinesc cerinţele si prezinta un nivel adecvat de organizare si detalii, oferind un grad rezonabil pentru realizarea lucrarii. Calificativ: Irelevant – Punctaj acordat 0 puncte Ofertantul trateaza in mod generic sau limitat elementele solicitate in cadrul subfactorului 3, ce reflecta ca: resursele indicate nu sunt exact corelate cu complexitatea activitatilor si subactivitatilor propuse din cadrul contractului, demonstrand ca planul de lucru nu este pe deplin corelat cu Metodologia de executie Acest nivel este acordat ofertanţilor care indeplinesc cerintele minime specificate in documentaţia de atribuire, fara a prezenta elemente suplimentare de valoare adaugata.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Technical sub-factor 3: The resources (human and material) and the outputs corresponding to each activity, carrying out adequate planning of the activities in correlation with the methodology for performing the work, and describing the responsibilities of the team members in implementing the contract and, where applicable, the contribution of each member of the group of economic operators, as well as the distribution and interaction of tasks and responsibilities between them. The scoring for this sub-factor will be awarded as follows: Rating: very good/exceptional – Score awarded 15 points The tenderer fully addresses all the detailed elements to obtain a maximum score, reflecting that the indicated resources are fully correlated with the complexity of the activities and sub-activities proposed under the contract, demonstrating that the work plan is aligned with the execution methodology. This level is awarded to tenderers who exceed the minimum and average requirements, demonstrating excellence in organization, methodology, and resource allocation. They add value to the project through innovative proposals and an optimized approach. Plant and equipment include modern, innovative technologies that reduce execution time, optimize consumption, and improve the quality of the work. The roles and responsibilities of the team are presented in detail, and the interaction between members and subcontractors is clearly optimized. The tenderer presents backup plans for human and material resources, avoiding execution bottlenecks. The technical and organizational solutions reflect efficiency and innovation (e.g., reducing execution time, optimizing resource consumption). Rating: Good/Adequate – Score awarded 7 points The tenderer addresses all the detailed elements under this sub-factor, which reflects that the indicated resources are partially correlated with the complexity of the activities and sub-activities proposed under the contract, demonstrating that the work plan is partially aligned with the execution methodology. The human resources are structured, including qualified personnel for critical activities. The execution planning is well described, including adequate technical solutions for consolidation works. The execution methodology is briefly described, without additional details. The team’s responsibilities are presented at a general level, without detailing the coordination or interaction of members. The execution schedule is presented, but does not sufficiently detail the correlation of resources with activities. The tenderer demonstrates that they can implement the contract, but with increased risks of delays or non-compliance. This level is awarded to tenderers who meet the requirements and present an adequate level of organization and detail, offering a reasonable degree for carrying out the work. Rating: Irrelevant – Score awarded 0 points The tenderer addresses in a generic or limited way the elements requested under sub-factor 3, which reflects that the indicated resources are not exactly correlated with the complexity of the activities and sub-activities proposed under the contract, demonstrating that the work plan is not fully aligned with the execution methodology. This level is awarded to tenderers who meet the minimum requirements specified in the award documentation, without presenting additional value-added elements.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Subfactor tehnic 4: Evidentierea drumului critic, Punctajul pentru acest sub-factor va fi acordat astfel: Calificativ: foarte bine / exceptional – Punctaj acordat 15 puncte Ofertantul trateaza in integralitate toate elementele detaliate pentru obtinerea unui punctaj maxim Ofertantul identifica integral toate activitatile aflate pe drumul critic asa cum rezulta acestea din extrasul din Graficul Gantt: - Reflecta capacitatea ofertantului de a inţelege in totalitate complexitatea proiectului si obiectivele contractuale - Reflecta ca lucrarile sunt realizate in termenul contractual printr-o planificare optimizata si realista - Permite monitorizarea continua a progresului si aplicarea masurilor corective in timp util - Drumul critic este in totalitate corelat cu metodologia de realizare a activitatilor - Drumul critic detaliat demonstreaza competenta tehnica si predictibilitate financiara in corelatie cu activitatile proiectului Calificativ: Bine/Adecvat – Punctaj acordat 7 puncte Ofertantul identifica partial activitatile aflate pe drumul critic asa cum rezulta acestea din extrasul din Graficul Gantt: - Punctele de reper (jaloanele) sunt identificate, dar nu sunt relevante prin raportare la rezultatele si rapoartele solicitate prin Caietul de sarcini si modalitatea efectiva de realizare a lucrarilor - Drumul critic nu se coreleaza in totalitate cu metodologia de realizare a lucrarilor. Exista neconcordanţe intre calendarul activitaţilor, punctele de reper (jaloane), drumul critic, rezultatele activitaţilor si metodologia propusa; Calificativ: Irelevant – Punctaj acordat 0 puncte Acest nivel este acordat ofertanţilor care indeplinesc cerinţele minime specificate in documentaţia de atribuire, fara a prezenta elemente suplimentare de valoare adaugata.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Technical subfactor 4: Highlighting the critical path. The score for this sub-factor will be awarded as follows: Rating: very good/exceptional – Score awarded: 15 points. The bidder fully addresses all detailed elements to obtain the maximum score. The bidder fully identifies all activities on the critical path as they result from the extract from the Gantt Chart: - Reflects the bidder’s capacity to fully understand the complexity of the project and the contractual objectives - Reflects that the works are carried out within the contractual deadline through optimized and realistic planning - Allows continuous monitoring of progress and the timely application of corrective measures - The critical path is fully correlated with the methodology for performing the activities - The detailed critical path demonstrates technical competence and financial predictability in correlation with the project’s activities Rating: Good/Adequate – Score awarded: 7 points. The bidder partially identifies the activities on the critical path as they result from the extract from the Gantt Chart: - Milestones are identified, but are not relevant in relation to the results and reports requested in the Terms of Reference and the actual manner of carrying out the works - The critical path is not fully correlated with the methodology for carrying out the works. There are inconsistencies between the schedule of activities, milestones, the critical path, the results of the activities and the proposed methodology; Rating: Irrelevant – Score awarded: 0 points. This level is awarded to bidders who meet the minimum requirements specified in the award documentation, without presenting additional elements of added value.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Termenul de livrare a produselor având o pondere de 10%: Componenta tehnica, Pentru termen de livrare produselor de la 0 pana la 24 de ore  de la comanda  se va acorda un punctaj de 10 puncte
Pentru termen de livrare produselor de la 24 pana la 48 de ore  de la comanda  se va acorda un punctaj de 3 puncte
Pentru termen de livrare produselor de la 48 pana la 72 de ore  de la comanda  se va acorda un punctaj de 1 punct
Pentru termen de livrare produselor mai mare de 72 ore de la comanda oferta fi declarata Neconforma.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Product delivery time with a weighting of 10%: Technical component. For a delivery time of the products from 0 to 24 hours from the order, a score of 10 points will be awarded.
For a delivery time of the products from 24 to 48 hours from the order, a score of 3 points will be awarded.
For a delivery time of the products from 48 to 72 hours from the order, a score of 1 point will be awarded.
For a delivery time of the products greater than 72 hours from the order, the offer will be declared non-compliant.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated points; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated points.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Termenul de livrare al produselor: Componenta Tehnica,
a) pentru cel mai scurt termen de livrare ofertat, se acordă punctajul maxim de 15 puncte.
b) Pentru un termen de livrare mai mare decât termenul minim ofertat prevăzut la litera a), punctajul se calculează invers proporțional, astfel: P2(n) = TLmin / TL(n) x punctajul maxim alocat.
P2(n) - punctaj acordat ofertantului “n” pentru timpul de livrare 
TLmin – termenul minim ofertat în cadrul procedurii – exprimat în zile
TL(n) – termenul de livrare ofertat de furnizorul (n) – altul decât furnizorul care a oferit TLmin – exprimat în zile
Valoarea punctajului se calculează cu două zecimale, prin rotunjire.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Delivery time of the products: Technical component,
a) For the shortest offered delivery time, the maximum score of 15 points is awarded.
b) For a delivery time longer than the minimum offered time provided under letter a), the score is calculated inversely proportional, as follows: P2(n) = TLmin / TL(n) × the maximum allocated score.
P2(n) – score awarded to bidder “n” for delivery time
TLmin – the minimum time offered within the procedure – expressed in days
TL(n) – the delivery time offered by supplier (n) – other than the supplier who offered TLmin – expressed in days
The score value is calculated to two decimals, by rounding.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Termen de garantie: Componenta Tehnica, Pentru oferta cu cel mai mare termen de garanție se acordă punctajul maxim de 15 puncte.
Pentru celelalte oferte, punctajul se calculează direct proporțional, astfel:
P3(n)= (G1n/G1max) x punctajul maxim alocat
P3(n) - punctaj tehnic acordat ofertantului n pentru garantia acordata;
G1n -garantia (în luni) oferita de ofertantul “n” 
G1max- garantia maxima ofertata (în luni) 
Valoarea punctajului se calculează cu două zecimale, prin rotunjire.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Warranty period: Technical component. The offer with the longest warranty period is awarded the maximum score of 15 points.
For the other offers, the score is calculated directly proportionally, as follows:
P3(n) = (G1n/G1max) × maximum allocated score
P3(n) – technical score awarded to bidder n for the warranty provided;
G1n – the warranty (in months) offered by bidder “n”; 
G1max – the maximum warranty offered (in months)
The score value is calculated to two decimals, by rounding.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Încadrarea în clase privind emisia de formaldehidă: Componenta Tehnica, P4(n) = E0(n)/E0max x punctajul maxim alocat.
P4(n) - punctaj acordat ofertantului “n” pentru produse din clasa E0 
E0max – numărul cel mai mare de produse din clasa E0 ofertate în cadrul procedurii
E0(n) – numărul de produse din clasa E0 ofertate în cadrul procedurii de către agentul economic “n”
Valoarea punctajului se calculează cu două zecimale, prin rotunjire.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Classification by formaldehyde emission classes: Technical Component, P4(n) = E0(n)/E0max × the maximum points allocated.
P4(n) – score awarded to bidder “n” for products in class E0
E0max – the highest number of E0-class products offered within the procedure
E0(n) – the number of E0-class products offered within the procedure by economic operator “n”
The score value is calculated to two decimal places, by rounding.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Timpul de interventie reparatie produse în garanție: Componenta Tehnica, a)   pentru cel mai scurt termen de interventie reparatie produse se acorda punctajul maxim de 15 puncte. 
b)   pentru celelalte termene de intervenție reparație produse, mai mare decât cel minim ofertat, punctajul se calculeaza invers proporțional, astfel: P5(n)= [Tmin/T(n)] x punctajul maxim alocat.
P5(n) – punctaj timp de intervenție pentru ofertantul “n”
   Tmin – cel mai scurt timp de intervenție ofertat în cadrul procedurii (exprimat în ore)
   T(n) – timpul de intervenție al ofertantului “n” (exprimat în ore)
Valoarea punctajului se calculează cu două zecimale, prin rotunjire.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Intervention time for repair of products under warranty: Technical Component, a) for the shortest intervention time for product repair, the maximum score of 15 points is awarded. b) for the other intervention times for product repair, longer than the minimum offered, the score is calculated inversely proportional, as follows: P5(n) = [Tmin/T(n)] x the maximum allocated score. P5(n) – intervention time score for bidder “n”    Tmin – the shortest intervention time offered within the procedure (expressed in hours)    T(n) – the intervention time of bidder “n” (expressed in hours) The score value is calculated to two decimal places, by rounding.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. Points are awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: „Criterii de performanta” (CP) se regaseste incarcata in documentatie: Componenta tehnica, otal punctaj factor: Unde: P (tehnic) = PT1+PT2+PT3 PT = Punctaj tehnic total PT1 – Punctaj pentru cerinta nr.1 PT2 – Punctaj pentru cerinta nr.2,PT3 – Punctaj pentru cerinta nr.3
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: The “Performance Criteria” (CP) is included/uploaded in the documentation: Technical component, total points factor. Where: P (technical) = PT1 + PT2 + PT3; PT = Total technical score; PT1 – Score for requirement no. 1; PT2 – Score for requirement no. 2; PT3 – Score for requirement no. 3.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (lowest offered price / price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Garanție: Componenta Tehnică, lgoritm de calcul: Componenta privind garanția acordată produselor cu o valoare de 30 de puncte din totalul de 100 de puncte și cu o pondere de 30% din totalul criteriului de atribuire, se vor acorda pentru factorul de evaluare „Garanție” pentru produsele ofertate, care nu poate fi mai mica de minim 1 an de la data punerii in funcțiune a echipamentului. Punctajul se acordă astfel: a) Pentru cel mai mare termen de garanție ofertat, se acordă punctajul maxim alocat, respectiv 30 puncte; b) Pentru un termen mai mic decât cel prevăzut la lit. a), punctajul TG(n) se calculează proporțional astfel: TG(n) = (TGn / TGmax) x 30, unde: TGmax = Termen maxim ofertat TGn = Termenul de garanție ofertat de respectivul ofertant pentru care se calculează punctajul.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Warranty: Technical component, calculation algorithm: The component concerning the warranty granted to the products has a value of 30 points out of a total of 100 points and a weight of 30% of the overall award criterion. Points will be awarded for the evaluation factor “Warranty” for the offered products, which cannot be less than a minimum of 1 year from the date the equipment is put into operation. Scoring is as follows: a) For the highest offered warranty term, the maximum allocated score is awarded, namely 30 points; b) For a term lower than that provided in letter a), the score TG(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: TG(n) = (TGn / TGmax) x 30, where: TGmax = Maximum offered term; TGn = The warranty term offered by the respective tenderer for whom the score is calculated.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Garanția produselor: Componenta tehnica, Algoritmul de calcul: punctajul maxim alocat este de 10 puncte și se acordă astfel:
a) pentru cea mai mare durată de garanție ofertată exprimată în luni, suplimentar față de cea minimă de 36 de luni, dar nu mai mult de 24 de luni, se acordă punctajul maxim alocat, respectiv 10 puncte;
b) pentru o durată de garanție mai mică decât cea prevăzută la lit.a), dar nu mai mica decât cea prevăzută în caietul de sarcini, respectiv de 36 luni, punctajul se calculează astfel:
PDG(n)=(DGn/DGmax) x 10, unde: DGmax=durata de garanție maximă ofertată, DGn= durata de garanție ofertată, PDG(n)=punctajul privind durata de garanție a ofertei care se evaluează.
Ofertele ce prezintă valorile minime impuse prin caietul de sarcini vor fi declarate conforme dar nu se vor acorda puncta. Aceste costuri vor fi incluse în propunerea financiară. În vederea susținerii perioadei de garanție suplimentară față de perioada minimă de garanție solicitată, operatorii vor prezenta o declarație pe propria răspundere din care să rezulte asumarea garanției produselor livrate și modalitatea de intervenție în această perioadă.
Termenele de garanție în baza cărora se va puncta factorul de evaluare respectiv vor fi folosite în formula prezentată mai sus, vor fi exprimate în număr de luni de la data recepției produselor aferente contractului.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Product warranty: Technical component. Calculation algorithm: the maximum allocated score is 10 points and is awarded as follows:
a) for the longest offered warranty period expressed in months, in addition to the minimum of 36 months, but no more than 24 months extra, the maximum allocated score is awarded, namely 10 points;
b) for a warranty period shorter than that provided under letter a), but not shorter than that provided in the specifications, namely 36 months, the score is calculated as follows:
PDG(n) = (DGn / DGmax) x 10, where: DGmax = the maximum offered warranty period, DGn = the offered warranty period, PDG(n) = the score regarding the warranty duration of the offer being evaluated.
Offers that present the minimum values imposed by the specifications will be declared compliant but will not be awarded points. These costs will be included in the financial proposal. In order to support the warranty period offered beyond the minimum warranty period requested, operators shall submit a statement on their own responsibility showing the assumption of the warranty for the delivered products and the method of intervention during this period.
The warranty terms on the basis of which the respective evaluation factor will be scored, and will be used in the formula presented above, will be expressed in number of months from the date of acceptance of the products under the contract.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Etichetarea ecologică: Componenta tehnica, Se acordă puncte dacă ofertantul prezintă eticheta ecologică a UE pentru mobilier, astfel cum       s-a stabilit în Decizia (UE) 2016/1332 a Comisiei sau alte etichete ecologice ISO14024 tipul I relevante care îndeplinesc în mod direct cerințele menționate sunt considerate a fi conforme.
Algoritm de calcul:
a)   Pentru cel mai mare număr de produse cu etichetă ecologică din produsele de mobilier se acordă un punctaj maxim alocat de 10 puncte;
b)   Pentru restul ofertelor, punctajul se va calcula după următoarea formulă: P3 etichetă      ecologică mobilier=(număr produse cu etichetă ecologică mobilier ofertate/număr maxim produse mobilier ofertate) x 10
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Eco-labelling: Technical component. Points are awarded if the bidder presents the EU Ecolabel for furniture, as established in Commission Decision (EU) 2016/1332, or other relevant ISO 14024 Type I eco-labels that directly meet the stated requirements; these are considered compliant.
Scoring algorithm:
a) For the largest number of furniture products with an eco-label, the maximum allocated score of 10 points is awarded;
b) For the remaining offers, the score will be calculated using the following formula: P3 furniture eco-label = (number of furniture products offered with an eco-label / maximum number of furniture products offered) x 10.

Primary packaging made from recycled materials: Technical component. The criterion applies only to primary packaging as defined in Directive 2004/12/EC and Law 249/2015 on the management of packaging and packaging waste. If cardboard boxes are used, they must be composed of at least 50% recycled material. If plastic bags or films are used for final packaging, they must be composed of at least 50% recycled material or be biodegradable or compostable, in accordance with the definitions set out in EN 13432.
Scoring algorithm: If primary packaging made from recycled materials is NOT used, no points will be awarded.
If primary packaging containing recycled materials is used in a proportion less than or equal to 50%, no points will be awarded. The offer that contains the highest proportion of primary packaging made from recycled materials will receive the maximum score of 10 points. For the other offers, the score is awarded as follows:
P eco(n) = (% n - 50% / % max - 50%) x 10, where:
Peco(n) – the score obtained by the admissible bid under evaluation;
% n – the proportion of primary packaging made from recycled materials in the bid being evaluated;
% max – the highest proportion of primary packaging made from recycled materials offered.
Supporting document:
Self-declaration regarding the percentage of primary packaging made from recycled materials. Products that hold a relevant Type I ecolabel and meet the listed criteria are scored accordingly. Alternatively, a declaration of conformity with this criterion regarding the product’s packaging is provided.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. Points are awarded as follows: a) The lowest price is awarded the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Expert Securitate IT: Cerinta minima: 
Experienta profesionala specifica detinuta in pozitia de Expert securitate IT, indeplinind acelasi tip de activitati sau similare cu cele pe care urmeaza sa le indeplineasca in viitorul contract, in cadrul cel putin a unui proiect. 
Neindeplinirea cerintei minime (cel putin un contract) atrage declararea ofertei ca "neconforma".

Expertul Securitate IT are urmatoarele principale atributii: 
-   Montaj si instalare si configurare solutie firewall
-   Configurare tunele VPN intre locatiile spitalului
-   Instalare si configurare switch-uri si VLAN-uri, 
-   Instalare, configurare si monitorizare retea prin solutie dedicata
-   Instalare si configurare solutie SIEM (solutie de management a incidentelor de securitate informatice)

Pentru alte detalii, a se accesa caietul de sarcini., Se va puncta experienta detinuta in pozitia de Expert securitate IT dupa cum urmeaza:
a)  Pentru experienta constand in participarea in cadrul unui contract = 0 puncte. 
b)  Pentru experienta constand in participarea in 2 contracte = 2 puncte;   
c)   Pentru experienta constand in participarea in 3-4 contracte = 3 puncte;   
d)  Pentru experienta constand in participarea in 5 sau mai multe contracte = 5 puncte.     
    
Pentru a demonstra indeplinirea cerintelor minime privind expertii cheie, ofertantii vor prezenta urmatoarele documente:  
1. diploma care sa demonstreze faptul ca persoana nominalizata are studii superioare cu diploma de licenta sau echivalent in domeniul inginerie de calculatoare – sau echivalent; 
2. Curriculum Vitae (CV) – format Europass, semnat si datat de expert;
3. documente relevante emise sau contrasemnate de beneficiar/ contractant principal care confirma experienta specifica declarata in CV; 
4.  Declaratie de disponibilitate pe parcursul derularii proiectului , semnata si datata de expert.

In cadrul CV-ului vor fi specificate:
- contractele in care expertul a participat, in calitate de expert securitate IT  
- pozitia specifica din cadrul contractului
- atributiile pe care le-a realizat in cadrul contractului.

Documentele care confirma cele declarate in cadrul CV-ului, trebuie sa indeplineasca urmatoarele conditii:
1. Sa fie emise sau contrasemnate de beneficiar sau de contractantul principal;
2. Din documente trebuie sa reiese, in mod clar:
- faptul ca expertul propus a detinut pozitia de expert securitate IT  
- obiectul contractului in care expertul propus a detinut pozitia de expert securitate IT .

Documentele care confirma cele declarate in cadrul CV-ului pot fi (fara a se limita la) procese verbale de predare-primire semnate de beneficiar/recomandari de la beneficiarii/contractantii principali sau orice alte documente relevante emise sau contrasemnate de beneficiar sau de contractantul principal care atesta experienta specifica (cu titlu de exemplu: contract individual de munca, contract de colaborare, fisa postului, etc).
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
IT Security Expert: Minimum requirement:
Specific professional experience held in the position of IT Security Expert, performing the same type of activities or similar to those to be performed under the future contract, within at least one project.
Failure to meet the minimum requirement (at least one contract) will result in the bid being declared "non-compliant".

The IT Security Expert has the following main duties:
- Assembly, installation and configuration of a firewall solution
- Configuration of VPN tunnels between the hospital’s locations
- Installation and configuration of switches and VLANs
- Installation, configuration and monitoring of the network through a dedicated solution
- Installation and configuration of a SIEM solution (security incident and event management solution)

For further details, please consult the specifications. The experience held in the position of IT Security Expert will be scored as follows:
a) Experience consisting of participation under 1 contract = 0 points.
b) Experience consisting of participation under 2 contracts = 2 points.
c) Experience consisting of participation under 3–4 contracts = 3 points.
d) Experience consisting of participation under 5 or more contracts = 5 points.

To demonstrate fulfillment of the minimum requirements regarding key experts, bidders shall submit the following documents:
1. A diploma showing that the nominated person has higher education with a bachelor’s degree or equivalent in computer engineering—or equivalent;
2. Curriculum Vitae (CV) – Europass format, signed and dated by the expert;
3. Relevant documents issued or countersigned by the beneficiary/main contractor confirming the specific experience declared in the CV;
4. Declaration of availability for the duration of the project, signed and dated by the expert.

The CV shall specify:
- the contracts in which the expert participated, as an IT Security Expert
- the specific position within the contract
- the duties performed under the contract.

The documents that confirm the statements in the CV must meet the following conditions:
1. Be issued or countersigned by the beneficiary or the main contractor;
2. The documents must clearly show:
- that the proposed expert held the position of IT Security Expert
- the subject matter of the contract in which the proposed expert held the position of IT Security Expert.

The documents confirming the statements in the CV may include (without being limited to) handover-reception minutes signed by the beneficiary/recommendations from beneficiaries/main contractors or any other relevant documents issued or countersigned by the beneficiary or the main contractor that attest the specific experience (for example: individual employment contract, collaboration contract, job description, etc.).

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Expert infrastructura IT: Cerinta minima:
Experienta profesionala specifica detinuta in pozitia de Expertul infrastructura IT, indeplinind acelasi tip de activitati sau similare cu cele pe care urmeaza sa le indeplinasca in viitorul contract, in cadrul cel putin a unui proiect. 
Neindeplinirea cerintei minime (cel putin un contract) atrage declararea ofertei ca "neconforma".

Expertul infrastructura IT are urmatoarele pricipale atributii: 
-   Montaj, instalare si configurare echipamente hardware (UPS, servere, unitate stocare, etc)
-   Instalare si configurare servere
-   Instalare si configurare unitate de stocare si librarie de banda
-   Realizare solutie de disponibilitate crescuta (Cluster)
-   Implementare solutie de backup
-   Integrare infrastructura nou achizitionata cu infrastructura de retea existenta in spital pentru buna functionare a aplicatiilor 

Pentru alte detalii, a se accesa caietul de sarcini., Algoritm de calcul: 
Se va puncta experienta detinuta in pozitia de Expertul infrastructura IT dupa cum urmeaza:
a)  Pentru experienta constand in participarea in cadrul unui contract = 0 puncte. 
b)  Pentru experienta constand in participarea in 2 contracte = 2 puncte;   
c)   Pentru experienta constand in participarea in 3-4 contracte = 3 puncte;   
d)  Pentru experienta constand in participarea in 5 sau mai multe contracte = 5 puncte.     
    
Pentru a demonstra indeplinirea cerintelor minime privind expertii cheie, ofertantii vor prezenta urmatoarele documente:  
1. diploma care sa demonstreze faptul ca persoana nominalizata are studii superioare cu diploma de licenta sau echivalent in domeniul inginerie de calculatoare  – sau echivalent; 
2. Curriculum Vitae (CV) – format Europass, semnat si datat de expert;
4. documente relevante emise sau contrasemnate de beneficiar/ contractant principal care confirma experienta specifica declarata in CV; 
5.  Declaratie de disponibilitate pe parcursul derularii proiectului , semnata si datata de expert.

In cadrul CV-ului vor fi specificate:
- contractele in care expertul a participat, in calitate de expert infrastructura IT  
- pozitia specifica din cadrul contractului
- atributiile pe care le-a realizat in cadrul contractului.

Documentele care confirma cele declarate in cadrul CV-ului, trebuie sa indeplineasca urmatoarele conditii:
1. Sa fie emise sau contrasemnate de beneficiar sau de contractantul principal;
2. Din documente trebuie sa reiese, in mod clar:
- faptul ca expertul propus a detinut pozitia de expert infrastructura IT  
- obiectul contractului in care expertul propus a detinut pozitia de expert infrastructura IT .

Documentele care confirma cele declarate in cadrul CV-ului pot fi (fara a se limita la) procese verbale de predare-primire semnate de beneficiar/recomandari de la beneficiarii/contractantii principali sau orice alte documente relevante emise sau contrasemnate de beneficiar sau de contractantul principal care atesta experienta specifica (cu titlu de exemplu: contract individual de munca, contract de colaborare, fisa postului, etc).
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
IT Infrastructure Expert: Minimum requirement:
Specific professional experience held in the position of IT Infrastructure Expert, performing the same type of activities or similar to those to be carried out under the future contract, within at least one project.
Failure to meet the minimum requirement (at least one contract) will result in the bid being declared "non-compliant".

The IT Infrastructure Expert has the following main duties:
- Assembly, installation and configuration of hardware equipment (UPS, servers, storage unit, etc.)
- Installation and configuration of servers
- Installation and configuration of storage unit and tape library
- Implementing a high-availability solution (Cluster)
- Implementing a backup solution
- Integrating the newly acquired infrastructure with the hospital's existing network infrastructure for the proper functioning of applications

For further details, please consult the specifications. Scoring algorithm:
Experience held in the position of IT Infrastructure Expert will be scored as follows:
a) Experience consisting of participation in one contract = 0 points.
b) Experience consisting of participation in 2 contracts = 2 points;
c) Experience consisting of participation in 3–4 contracts = 3 points;
d) Experience consisting of participation in 5 or more contracts = 5 points.

To demonstrate fulfillment of the minimum requirements regarding key experts, bidders shall submit the following documents:
1. Diploma showing that the nominated person has higher education with a bachelor's degree or equivalent in the field of computer engineering – or equivalent;
2. Curriculum Vitae (CV) – Europass format, signed and dated by the expert;
4. Relevant documents issued or countersigned by the beneficiary/main contractor confirming the specific experience declared in the CV;
5. Declaration of availability for the duration of the project, signed and dated by the expert.

The CV shall specify:
- The contracts in which the expert participated, as IT Infrastructure Expert
- The specific position held within the contract
- The duties performed under the contract.

The documents that confirm the statements made in the CV must meet the following conditions:
1. They must be issued or countersigned by the beneficiary or the main contractor;
2. The documents must clearly show:
- That the proposed expert held the position of IT Infrastructure Expert
- The object of the contract in which the proposed expert held the position of IT Infrastructure Expert.

The documents confirming the statements made in the CV may be (without limitation) handover-acceptance minutes signed by the beneficiary/recommendations from beneficiaries/main contractors or any other relevant documents issued or countersigned by the beneficiary or the main contractor attesting the specific experience (for example: individual employment contract, collaboration contract, job description, etc.).

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Memorie RAM suplimentara pentru serverele de tip cluster (2 buc): Memoria RAM suplimentara pentru cele 2 servere care alcatuiesc solutia de Cluster (Disponibilitate crescuta), ofera sistemului informatic multe beneficii din perspectiva vitezei de procesare a datelor utilizate de aplicatii.
Investiția în mai multă memorie RAM pentru cluster este o strategie inteligentă pentru a debloca întregul potențial al configurației. Aceasta va duce la timpi de răspuns mai rapizi, o performanță îmbunătățită a aplicațiilor, o gestionare mai eficientă a datelor. 
Rezulta astfel o viteza marita de procesare a datelor. 
Pentru serverele de backup si active directory este considerata suficienta capacitatea de memorie prevazuta in caietul de sarcini, fiind punctate in cadrul acestui factor doar serverele de tip cluster (2 buc), Memoria minima a RAM-ului pentru cele 2 servere tip cluster este cea mentionata in caietul de sarcini, respectiv 512 GB. 
Se vor acorda puncte suplimentare pentru produsele care prezintă o capacitate mai mare decât minimul solictat/server. Se pot acorda maximum 10 puncte (total pentru ambele servere).

Punctajul pentru factorul de evaluare „Capacitatea minimă a RAM-ului pentru Cluster de Servere” se acordă astfel:
a) Pentru ofertele care includ servere tip cluster prevăzute cu o capacitate suplimentara a RAM-ului de 128 GB, se vor acorda 2,5 puncte / 1 server;
a) Pentru ofertele care includ servere tip cluster prevăzute cu o capacitate suplimentara a RAM-ului de 256 GB, se vor acorda 5 puncte / 1 server. 
Punctaj maxim acordat: 10 / 2 servere

 Verificare:
Pentru verificarea nivelului de îndeplinire al factorului de evaluare, Ofertantul trebuie să prezinte fișele tehnice ale produselor ofertate.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Additional RAM memory for cluster-type servers (2 units): The additional RAM memory for the 2 servers that make up the Cluster solution (High Availability) offers the IT system many benefits in terms of the speed of processing the data used by applications.
Investing in more RAM for the cluster is an intelligent strategy to unlock the full potential of the configuration. This will lead to faster response times, improved application performance, and more efficient data management.
Thus, a higher data processing speed results.
For the backup and Active Directory servers, the memory capacity provided in the specifications is considered sufficient; within this factor only the cluster-type servers (2 units) will be scored. The minimum RAM memory for the two cluster-type servers is that mentioned in the specifications, namely 512 GB.
Additional points will be awarded for products that provide a capacity greater than the minimum requested per server. A maximum of 10 points can be awarded (total for both servers).

Scoring for the evaluation factor “Minimum RAM capacity for the Server Cluster” is awarded as follows:
a) For offers that include cluster-type servers with an additional RAM capacity of 128 GB, 2.5 points will be awarded per server;
a) For offers that include cluster-type servers with an additional RAM capacity of 256 GB, 5 points will be awarded per server.
Maximum points awarded: 10 / 2 servers

Verification:
To verify the level of fulfillment of the evaluation factor, the Tenderer must present the technical datasheets of the offered products.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Perioadă de garanție extinsă echipamente hardware: O garanție extinsa pentru echipamente asigura o disponibilitate ridicată a infrastructurii, menține o performanță stabilă, reduce riscul de downtime costisitor, permite acces rapid la suport și înlocuiri în cazul unor defecțiuni hardware, asigurand functionalitatea echipamentelor pe termen indelungat si reparatii prompte in cazul defectiunilor, Garanția pentru echipamente hardware este de 24 sau 36 luni, functie de echipament, conform caietului de sarcini.
Ofertarea acestei garantii / echipament este obligatorie si nu se puncteaza. Ofertarea unei garantii / echipament mai mica decat cea prevazuta in caietul de sarcini atrage respingerea ofertei.
Pentru un numar de peste 50 de luni se acorda acelasi punctaj maxim (10 puncte); de exemplu operatorii economici care oferteaza 52 de luni, sau 70 de luni, sau 120 luni vor primi toti cate 10 puncte/echipament (punctajul maxim alocat pentru acest factor de evaluare).
Punctajul pentru factorul de evaluare „Perioada de garantie extinsa echipamente hardware se acordă astfel:
   pentru cel mai mare numar de luni de garantie ofertate /tip echipament se acordă punctajul maxim alocat. Garantia minima este de 24 luni/36 luni, functie de echipament.
   pentru celelalte oferte, punctajul G_nTEHNIC  se calculează proporțional, astfel:
G_nTEHNIC  = (Numar luni garantie “n”/ Nr luni garantie maxim) x  punctaj maxim alocat  / tip echipament 
   Unde: 
             Nr luni garantie maxim   = numarul cel mai mare de luni de garantie ofertate / tip echipament 
             Numar luni garantie “n”    = Numar luni garantie ofertate de ofertantul ”n” / tip echipament 
Punctajul maxim alocat   = 10 puncte

Pentru G_nTEHNIC  reprezentand garantia suplimentara ofertata pentru echipamentul analizat, punctajul se calculeaza individual, pentru fiecare echipament hardware pentru care se ofera garantie suplimentara, iar punctajul final al ofertei se obtine prin aplicarea urmatoarei formule: 
G_nTEHNIC  = G_nTEHNIC prod1+.... G_nTEHNIC  prodX / NT 
   unde 
       G_nTEHNIC  – punctaj garantie suplimentara / oferta , 
       G_nTEHNIC  prod1 – garantia suplimentara pentru produsul ”1” din oferta , 
       G_nTEHNIC  prodX – garantia suplimentara pentru produsul ”X” din oferta, 
       NT – numărul total al echipamentelor hardware pentru care se ofera garantie suplimentara/oferta.

Modalitatea de îndeplinire: se vor depune modele de certificate de garanție/ declarații de garanție sau orice alte documente echivalente de unde să reiasă perioada de garanție pentru componentele hardware ofertate.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Extended warranty period for hardware equipment: An extended warranty for equipment ensures high infrastructure availability, maintains stable performance, reduces the risk of costly downtime, allows rapid access to support and replacements in case of hardware failures, ensuring the long-term functionality of the equipment and prompt repairs in case of failures. The warranty for hardware equipment is 24 or 36 months, depending on the equipment, according to the specifications.
Offering this warranty/equipment is mandatory and is not scored. Offering a warranty/equipment shorter than that provided in the specifications leads to rejection of the bid.
For a number of more than 50 months, the same maximum score is awarded (10 points); for example, economic operators who offer 52 months, or 70 months, or 120 months will all receive 10 points per equipment (the maximum score allocated for this evaluation factor).
The scoring for the evaluation factor “Extended warranty period for hardware equipment” is awarded as follows:
   for the highest number of warranty months offered per equipment type, the maximum allocated score is awarded. The minimum warranty is 24 months/36 months, depending on the equipment.
   for the other offers, the score G_nTEHNIC is calculated proportionally, as follows:
G_nTEHNIC = (Number of warranty months “n” / Maximum number of warranty months) × maximum allocated score / per equipment type
   Where:
             Maximum number of warranty months = the highest number of warranty months offered per equipment type
             Number of warranty months “n” = the number of warranty months offered by bidder “n” per equipment type
Maximum allocated score = 10 points

For G_nTEHNIC representing the additional warranty offered for the analyzed equipment, the score is calculated individually for each hardware equipment for which an additional warranty is offered, and the final offer score is obtained by applying the following formula:
G_nTEHNIC = G_nTEHNIC prod1 + … + G_nTEHNIC prodX / NT
   where
       G_nTEHNIC – additional warranty score / offer,
       G_nTEHNIC prod1 – the additional warranty for product “1” in the offer,
       G_nTEHNIC prodX – the additional warranty for product “X” in the offer,
       NT – the total number of hardware equipment for which an additional warranty is offered / offer.

Method of fulfillment: samples of warranty certificates/declarations of warranty or any other equivalent documents shall be submitted from which the warranty period for the offered hardware components is evident.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Consum de energie in modul stare de veghe si inactiv pentru servere (4 buc) si unitatea de stocare (1 buc): Ofertantul are posibilitatea sa furnizeze echipamente care respecta cerinţele Energy Star sau echivalent, referitoare la un consum de energie semnificativ redus în modurile stare de veghe şi inactiv, care constituie o parte semnificativă a utilizării energiei pentru toate tipurile de produse., Punctajul se calculeaza in felul urmator:
-Pentru fiecare echipament ofertat care este certificat cu standardul Energy Star sau echivalent se va acorda un punctaj de 2 puncte.
Punctaj maxim obtinut 2 x 5 buc = 10 
Ofertantul trebuie să dovedească îndeplinrea respectării Energy Star pentru echipamentele menționate cu fișele tehnice ale produsului obținute de pe website-ul: https://www.energystar.gov sau cu orice alte documente care dovedesc indeplinirea cerintei. 

Punctaj maxim factor: 10
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Energy consumption in sleep and idle mode for servers (4 units) and the storage unit (1 unit): The bidder may supply equipment that meets Energy Star or equivalent requirements related to significantly reduced energy consumption in sleep and idle modes, which constitute a significant share of energy use for all types of products. The scoring is calculated as follows:
- For each offered piece of equipment that is certified to the Energy Star standard or equivalent, a score of 2 points will be awarded.
Maximum score obtained: 2 x 5 units = 10.
The bidder must prove compliance with Energy Star for the mentioned equipment with product technical datasheets obtained from the website https://www.energystar.gov or with any other documents that demonstrate fulfillment of the requirement.

Maximum factor score: 10

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Adaugarea  echipamentelor in solutia de monitorizare  existenta (CENTREON): Integrarea noilor echipamente în soluția de monitorizare Centreon existenta in spital maximizează eficiența operațională, reduce complexitatea, oferă o vizibilitate completă asupra stării de sănătate și performanței întregii infrastructuri IT a clientului. Aceasta asigură o gestionare proactivă, un răspuns mai rapid la probleme și o înțelegere mai profundă a performanței sistemelor.
Integrarea cu solutia existenta este esentiala pentru buna functionare a sistemului informatic functional la nivelul spitalului.
Echipamentele: server (4 buc), switch-uri (16 buc), unitate NAS (1buc), solutia de stocare (1 buc), router (1 buc), librarie banda (1 buc) vor fi integrate in sistemul de monitorizare existent – CENTREON, asigurandu-se continuitatea monitorizarii datelor din spital., Pentru solutia propusa de ofertant care se va integra in CENTREON se vor puncta urmatorii parametrii monitorizati / fiecare tip de echipament:  
-  host alive – 3 puncte 
-  procesor  – 3 puncte
-  memorie  – 4 puncte
Pentru 〖ESM〗_nTEHNIC reprezentand parametrii monororizati pentru tipul de echipament analizat, punctajul se calculeaza individual, pentru fiecare echipament pentru care se monitorizeaza parametrii solicitati, iar punctajul final al ofertei se obtine prin aplicarea urmatoarei formule: 
〖ESM〗_nTEHNIC  = 〖ESM〗_nTEHNIC prod1+.... 〖ESM〗_nTEHNIC  prodX / NT 
   unde 
       〖ESM〗_nTEHNIC  – punctaj adaugare  echipamentelor in solutia de monitorizare  existenta / oferta, 
       〖ESM〗_nTEHNIC  prod1 – punctaj adaugare  echipamentelor in solutia de monitorizare  existenta produsul ”1” din oferta, 
       ESMTEHNIC  prodX – punctaj adaugare  echipamentelor in solutia de monitorizare  existenta ”X” din oferta, 
       NT – numărul total al echipamentelor ofertate pentru care se puncteaza parametrii.

Punctaj maxim factor: 10
Modalitatea de îndeplinire: se vor depune declaratii ale ofertantului de unde să reiasă parametrii monitorizati pentru fiecare tip de echipament ofertat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Adding equipment to the existing monitoring solution (CENTREON): Integrating the new equipment into the existing Centreon monitoring solution in the hospital maximizes operational efficiency, reduces complexity, and provides full visibility over the health and performance of the client’s entire IT infrastructure. This ensures proactive management, a faster response to issues, and a deeper understanding of system performance.
Integration with the existing solution is essential for the proper functioning of the hospital-wide IT system.
The equipment—server (4 units), switches (16 units), NAS unit (1 unit), storage solution (1 unit), router (1 unit), tape library (1 unit)—will be integrated into the existing monitoring system (CENTREON), ensuring continuity of monitoring the hospital’s data. For the solution proposed by the tenderer that will be integrated into CENTREON, the following monitored parameters will be scored for each type of equipment:
- host alive – 3 points
- processor – 3 points
- memory – 4 points
For ESM_nTECHNIC representing the monitored parameters for the type of equipment analyzed, the score is calculated individually for each equipment for which the requested parameters are monitored, and the final score of the offer is obtained by applying the following formula:
ESM_nTECHNIC = ESM_nTECHNIC prod1 + … ESM_nTECHNIC prodX / NT
where
ESM_nTECHNIC – score for adding equipment to the existing monitoring solution / offer,
ESM_nTECHNIC prod1 – score for adding equipment to the existing monitoring solution for product “1” in the offer,
ESMTECHNIC prodX – score for adding equipment to the existing monitoring solution for product “X” in the offer,
NT – the total number of offered equipment for which the parameters are scored.

Maximum score for factor: 10
Method of compliance: declarations by the tenderer shall be submitted showing the monitored parameters for each type of offered equipment.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. Points are awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Extindere perioada garanție: Durata minima a garantiei de buna executie este de 3 ani. Pentru o durata a garantiei mai mica decat durata minim acceptata de 3 ani, oferta va fi declarata neconforma.
Extinderea duratei de garantie se face cu adaugarea unui an intreg (ex:3 ani + 1 an=4 ani, 3 ani + 2 ani = 5 ani), Algoritm de calcul: 
Punctajul pentru Garantia extinsa a produselor se acorda astfel:
0 (zero) puncte pentru garantia minima de 3 ani;
5 (zece) puncte pentru extinderea duratei de garantie de la 3 ani la 4 ani, respectiv pentru un an de extra-garantie;
10 (douazeci) puncte pentru extinderea duratei de garantie de la 3 ani la 5 ani, respectiv pentru doi ani de extra-garantie 
Nu se acorda punctaj intermediar pentru intervale mai mici de 12 luni. Pentru ofertele care aloca o garantie a produselor peste 5 ani se va acorda punctajul maxim alocat de 10 puncte.

Punctaj maxim total: 100
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Extension of the warranty period: The minimum duration of the performance warranty is 3 years. For a warranty duration shorter than the minimum acceptable duration of 3 years, the offer will be declared non-compliant.
The extension of the warranty duration is made by adding full years (e.g., 3 years + 1 year = 4 years, 3 years + 2 years = 5 years). Calculation algorithm:
Scoring for the extended product warranty is as follows:
0 (zero) points for the minimum warranty of 3 years;
5 points for extending the warranty duration from 3 years to 4 years, i.e., for one extra year of warranty;
10 points for extending the warranty duration from 3 years to 5 years, i.e., for two extra years of warranty.
No intermediate score is awarded for intervals of less than 12 months. For offers that provide a product warranty of more than 5 years, the maximum allocated score of 10 points will be given.

Maximum total score: 100

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest of the prices is awarded the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Nivel de asigurare a protecției mediului – norma poluare autospeciale: Componenta tehnica, Punctajul pentru factorul de evaluare: „Norma de poluare autospeciale”
Numarul minim al autospecialelor este stabilit in caietul de sarcini pentru fiecare activitate.
Punctjul acordat factorului de evaluare:
    a) Pentru o proportie de 60 - 80% de autospeciale de tip Hibrid sau Electric din numarul total de autospeciale propuse pentru derularea contractului se vor acorda 10 puncte; 
    b) Pentru o proportie de peste 80% de autospeciale de tip Hibrid sau Electric din numarul total de autospeciale propuse pentru derularea contractului se va acorda punctaj maxim, respectiv 20 puncte.
In cazul in care autospecialele respecta standardul Euro 6 (standard minim solicitat conform caietului de sarcini) acestea vor fi declarate conforme, dar nu vor primi punctaj. 

Pentru demonstrarea încadrării în situațiile de mai sus, ofertantul va prezenta:
- Lista autospecialelor 
- Documente care să ateste norma de poluare Euro 6 sau Hibrid/Electric: cartea de identitate a autovehiculului (CIV) și/ sau certificatul de înmatriculare cu inspecția tehnică efectuată și/ sau fișele tehnice ale utilajelor și/sau certificările producătorilor
Punctajul maxim total este de 100 de puncte. Va castiga oferta cu cel mai mare punctaj;  În cazul în care două sau mai multe oferte sunt clasate pe primul loc, cu punctaje egale, departajarea se va face având în vedere punctajul obţinut la factorii de evaluare în ordinea descrescătoare a ponderilor acestora. În situaţia în care egalitatea se menţine, autoritatea contractantă are dreptul să solicite noi propuneri financiare, şi oferta câştigătoare va fi desemnată cea cu propunerea financiară cea mai mică.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Level of ensuring environmental protection – pollution standard for special-purpose vehicles: Technical component, scoring for the evaluation factor: “Pollution standard for special-purpose vehicles”.
The minimum number of special-purpose vehicles is set in the specifications for each activity.
Score awarded for the evaluation factor:
    a) For a proportion of 60–80% hybrid or electric special-purpose vehicles out of the total number of special-purpose vehicles proposed for performance of the contract, 10 points will be awarded;
    b) For a proportion of over 80% hybrid or electric special-purpose vehicles out of the total number of special-purpose vehicles proposed for performance of the contract, the maximum score will be awarded, namely 20 points.
If the special-purpose vehicles comply with the Euro 6 standard (the minimum standard required according to the specifications), they will be declared compliant, but will not receive any points.

To demonstrate falling under the above situations, the tenderer shall submit:
- The list of special-purpose vehicles
- Documents attesting the Euro 6 pollution standard or Hybrid/Electric: the vehicle identity card (CIV) and/or the registration certificate with technical inspection carried out and/or the technical sheets of the equipment and/or manufacturers’ certifications.
The total maximum score is 100 points. The tender with the highest score will win; if two or more tenders are ranked first with equal scores, the tie-break shall be made taking into account the score obtained for the evaluation factors in the decreasing order of their weights. If equality persists, the contracting authority has the right to request new financial proposals, and the winning tender will be the one with the lowest financial proposal.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Termenul de garanție al produselor: Termenul de garanție al produselor, Se vor puncta garantiile cuprinse intre 24 si 36 de luni. 
Pentru garanțiile de  36 de luni se va acorda punctaj maxim de 20 de puncte.Garantiile peste 36 de luni NU  vor fi punctate suplimentar. Garantiile intre 24 si 36 luni vor fi punctate proportional dupa urmatorul algoritm de calcul: 
Punctajul se acorda astfel: 
a) pentru oferta cu durata perioadei de garanție maxima de 36 luni se acorda punctajul maxim alocat, de 20 de puncte. 
b) Pentru alte durate de garanție, punctajul se acorda conform algoritmului de calcul: 
 (Dg(n) / Dg(Max) ) x 20, 
 Unde: 
Dg(n) = Durata perioadei de garanție a ofertei ”n” evaluata 
Dg(Max) = Durata perioadei de garanție cea mai mare ofertata , dintre ofertele admisibile 
Daca nu se oferă garanție suplimentară peste valoarea minimă solicitată se acordă 0 puncte și reprezintă conformitatea ofertei.
Ofertele cu termen de garanție al produselor sub 24 de luni vor fi considerate neconforme (art.137 alin. (3) lit. a) din H.G. nr.395/2016).
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Product warranty period: The product warranty period. Warranties between 24 and 36 months will be scored. For warranties of 36 months, a maximum score of 20 points will be awarded. Warranties above 36 months will not be additionally scored. Warranties between 24 and 36 months will be scored proportionally according to the following calculation algorithm:
The score is awarded as follows:
a) for the offer with a maximum warranty period of 36 months, the maximum allocated score of 20 points is awarded.
b) For other warranty durations, the score is awarded according to the calculation algorithm:
 (Dg(n) / Dg(Max)) x 20,
 Where:
Dg(n) = Warranty period of the evaluated offer “n”
Dg(Max) = The largest warranty period offered among admissible offers
If no additional warranty beyond the minimum requested value is offered, 0 points are awarded and this represents the conformity of the offer.
Offers with a product warranty period below 24 months will be considered non-compliant (art. 137 para. (3) letter a) of Government Decision no. 395/2016).

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Capacitate memoria RAM: Capacitate memoria RAM, Capacitate memoria RAM – PONDERE 20% - Punctaj maxim 20 de puncte 
Se puncteaza memoria RAM suplimentara ofertata peste minimul de 24 GB. 
Algoritm de calcul:  
a) Pentru cea mai mare capacitate memorie RAM suplimentară ofertată peste valoarea minimă solicitată de 24  GB se acordă punctajul maxim de 20 de puncte; 
b) Pentru celălalte oferte, Pt = (Capacitate memorie RAM suplimentară ofertată peste valoare minimă solicitată/ Capacitatea memorie RAM suplimentară maximă ofertată peste valoarea minimă solicitată)x 20 Pt= punctajul acordat ofertantului pentu factorul de evaluare; 
c) Daca nu se oferă capacitate memorie RAM suplimentară peste valoarea minimă solicitată se acordă 0 puncte și reprezintă conformitatea ofertei.
Ofertele cu capacitate RAM sub 24 GB vor fi considerate neconforme (art.137 alin. (3) lit. a) din H.G. nr.395/2016).
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
RAM memory capacity: RAM memory capacity, RAM memory capacity – WEIGHT 20% – Maximum score 20 points.
Additional RAM memory offered above the minimum of 24 GB is scored.
Calculation algorithm:
a) For the highest additional RAM memory capacity offered above the minimum required value of 24 GB, the maximum score of 20 points is awarded;
b) For the other bids, Pt = (Additional RAM memory capacity offered above the minimum required value / Maximum additional RAM memory capacity offered above the minimum required value) x 20. Pt = the score awarded to the tenderer for the evaluation factor;
c) If no additional RAM memory capacity is offered above the minimum required value, 0 points are awarded and the offer is considered compliant.
Offers with RAM capacity below 24 GB will be considered non-compliant (art.137 para. (3) letter a) of Government Decision no. 395/2016).

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (lowest offered price / price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Capacitate stocare SSD: Capacitate stocare SSD, Capacitate stocare SSD - PONDERE 20% - Punctaj maxim 20 de 
Se puncteaza capacitatea de  stocare SSD peste valoarea minimă solicitată de 512 MB. 
Algoritm de calcul:
 a) Pentru cea mai mare capacitate stocare SSD suplimentară ofertată peste valoarea minimă solicitată de 512 MB se acordă punctajul maxim de 20 de puncte;
 b) Pentru celălalte oferte, Pt = (Capacitate stocare SSD suplimentară ofertată peste valoare minimă solicitată/ Capacitatea stocare SSD suplimentară maximă ofertată peste valoarea minimă solicitată)x 20 Pt= punctajul acordat ofertantului pentu factorul de evaluare; 
c) Daca nu se oferă capacitate stocare SSD suplimentară peste valoarea minimă solicitată se acordă 0 puncte și reprezintă conformitatea ofertei.
Ofertele cu capacitate stocare SSD  sub 512 MB vor fi considerate neconforme (art.137 alin. (3) lit. a) din H.G. nr.395/2016).
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
SSD storage capacity: SSD storage capacity, SSD storage capacity – WEIGHT 20% – Maximum score 20.
Points are awarded for SSD storage capacity offered above the minimum required value of 512 MB.
Calculation algorithm:
 a) For the largest additional SSD storage capacity offered above the minimum required value of 512 MB, the maximum score of 20 points is awarded;
 b) For the other offers, Pt = (Additional SSD storage capacity offered above the minimum required value / Maximum additional SSD storage capacity offered above the minimum required value) × 20. Pt = the score awarded to the tenderer for the evaluation factor;
 c) If no additional SSD storage capacity above the minimum required value is offered, 0 points are awarded, and this represents the offer’s compliance.
Offers with SSD storage capacity below 512 MB will be considered non-compliant (Art. 137 para. (3) letter a) of Government Decision no. 395/2016).

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. Points are awarded as follows: a) The lowest price is awarded the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Numărul produselor certificate ecologic (PE): Componenta tehnică 1, Punctajul se acordă astfel: Pentru oferta cu cel mai mare număr de produse ecologice incluse în ofertă se oferă 30 puncte. Pentru celelalte oferte care includ produse ecologice, punctajul se va calcula astfel: Ppe = (Npe / Nme) * 30, unde: Ppe – Punctajul pentru produsele certificate ecologic Npe – Numărul de produse ecologice aferent ofertei pentru care se calculează punctajul Nme – Cel mai mare număr de produse ecologice ofertat Pentru ofertele ce nu includ produse ecologice punctajul acordat va fi de 0 puncte. Ofertantul va prezenta certificatele pentru produsele ecologice ofertate. Nu se iau în considerare în calculul punctajului produsele indicate ca fiind certificate ecologic, dar pentru care nu a fost transmis certificatul pentru produse ecologice. Prin număr de produse ecologice se înțelege numărul de sortimente de produse (nu cantitatea din aceste sortimente). Toate produsele ecologice furnizate trebuie să îndeplinească cerinţele din Regulamentul (CE) 834/2007.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Number of organically certified products (PE): Technical component 1. Scoring is awarded as follows: For the offer with the highest number of organic products included in the offer, 30 points are awarded. For the other offers that include organic products, the score will be calculated as follows: Ppe = (Npe / Nme) * 30, where: Ppe – Score for organically certified products; Npe – Number of organic products for the offer for which the score is calculated; Nme – The highest number of organic products offered. For offers that do not include organic products, the score awarded will be 0 points. The tenderer shall present certificates for the offered organic products. Products indicated as being organically certified but for which the organic product certificate has not been submitted are not taken into account in the score calculation. By number of organic products is meant the number of product varieties (not the quantity of these varieties). All supplied organic products must meet the requirements of Regulation (EC) No 834/2007.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Price of the offer: Financial component. The score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Componenta tehnica: Ponderarea produselor care îndeplinesc criteriile ecologice pentru etichetă ecologică europeană - Ecolabel, conform specificatiilor din caietul de sarcini
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Technical component: Weighting of products that meet the ecological criteria for the European Ecolabel, according to the specifications in the tender documents.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Prețul ofertei: Componenta financiară, Punctajul se acordă astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scăzut dintre prețuri se acordă punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte prețuri ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculează proporțional, astfel: P(n) = (Preț minim ofertat / Preț n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Bid price: Financial component. Scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. Points are awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated points; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated points.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Metodologia de realizare a contractului si planificarea resurselor tehnice si umane in corelare cu specificul si complexitatea activitatilor: Descrierea, reprezentarea grafica si planificare activitatilor contractului in corelare cu resursele tehnice si umane raportat la specificul si complexitatea activitatilor., 1. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 16 puncte pentru ofertantii care prezinta o metodologie de implementare a contractului care demonstreaza o foarte buna intelegere a activitatilor stabilite in Cerintele Beneficiarului, precum si o buna documentare/ analiza a proiectului.
2. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 12 puncte pentru ofertantii care prezinta o metodologie de implementare a contractului care demonstreaza o buna intelegere a activitatilor stabilite in Cerintele Beneficiarului.
3. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 9 puncte pentru ofertantii care prezinta o metodologie de implementare a contractului care demonstreaza o intelegere limitata atat a sub-activitatilor care compun activitatile de proiectare si executie prevazute in Cerintele Beneficiarului, cat si in ceea ce priveste corelarea acestora cu resursele tehnice si umane necesare realizarii contractului.

Pentru obținerea punctajului maxim de 16 puncte, vor fi utilizate ambele tipuri de mijloace de transport „prietenos cu mediul”. 
Ofertanul va prezenta o declarație prin care își va asuma că va utiliza ca număr de mijloace de transport rutier sustenabil, minim 3 Autobasculante cu propulsie electrica și/sau hibridă din cele 51 autobasculante menționate în fișa de date. 

Completare in sectiunea II.2.5) - Criterii de atribuire  instructiuni pentru ofertanti.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Methodology for carrying out the contract and planning of technical and human resources in correlation with the specifics and complexity of the activities: Description, graphical representation and scheduling of the contract activities correlated with the technical and human resources, according to the specifics and complexity of the activities.

1. The Contracting Authority awards 16 points to tenderers who present a contract implementation methodology that demonstrates a very good understanding of the activities set out in the Beneficiary’s Requirements, as well as good documentation/analysis of the project.
2. The Contracting Authority awards 12 points to tenderers who present a contract implementation methodology that demonstrates a good understanding of the activities set out in the Beneficiary’s Requirements.
3. The Contracting Authority awards 9 points to tenderers who present a contract implementation methodology that demonstrates a limited understanding both of the sub-activities that make up the design and execution activities provided in the Beneficiary’s Requirements, and regarding their correlation with the technical and human resources necessary for executing the contract.

To obtain the maximum score of 16 points, both types of “environmentally friendly” means of transport will be used.
The tenderer shall submit a statement undertaking to use, as the number of sustainable road transport means, at least 3 dump trucks with electric and/or hybrid propulsion out of the 51 dump trucks mentioned in the data sheet.

Completion in section II.2.5) – Award criteria – instructions for tenderers.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Utilizarea BIM (Building Information Modelling): Utilizarea BIM (Building Information Modelling) in cadrul activitatilor care fac obiectul Contractului., Autoritatea contractanta acorda 6 puncte Ofertantilor care isi asuma utilizarea BIM in toate etapele contractului, in caz contrar nu se va acorda punctaj.

Nota 1: În vederea îndeplinirii cerintei referitoare la Utilizarea BIM (Building Information Modelling), ofertanții vor prezenta o declarație prin care își asumă utilizarea BIM atât pe perioada de proiectare cât și pe perioda de execuție. Totodată, în cadrul Metodologiei de realizare a contractului și planificarea resurselor tehnice, Ofertanții vor descrie modul în care vor utiliza BIM pe întreaga perioada de realizare a contractului.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Use of BIM (Building Information Modelling): Use of BIM (Building Information Modelling) within the activities that are the subject of the Contract. The contracting authority awards 6 points to bidders who commit to using BIM at all stages of the contract; otherwise, no points will be awarded.

Note 1: In order to meet the requirement regarding the use of BIM (Building Information Modelling), bidders shall submit a statement by which they undertake to use BIM both during the design phase and during the execution phase. Also, within the methodology for carrying out the contract and planning of technical resources, bidders shall describe how they will use BIM throughout the entire duration of the contract.

INGINER PROIECTANT TUNELURI: Experienta detinuta in pozitia de Inginer Proiectant Tuneluri in cadrul unor contracte de elaborare si/sau actualizare si/sau revizuire si/sau completatre studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de infrastructura de transport rutier (autostrada/ drum expres/drum national) si/ sau infrastructura de transport feroviar (inclusiv metrou) care au inclus galerii de tunel realizate prin excavatie in subteran cu o lungime minima de 500 m fiecare., Participarea expertului propus in pozitia de Inginer proiectant de tuneluri in contract/contracte in cadrul caruia/carora au fost elaborate si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite si/sau completate studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de infrastructura de transport rutier (autostrada/ drum expres/drum national) si/ sau infrastructura de transport feroviar (inclusiv metrou) care au inclus galerii de tunel realizate prin excavatie in subteran cu o lungime minima de 500 m fiecare, se va puncta astfel: 

2 galerii cu o lungime de minim 500 m fiecare: 2,5 puncte; 
3 galerii cu o lungime de minim 500 m fiecare: 4 puncte; 
4 sau mai multe galerii cu o lungime de minim 500 m fiecare: 5 puncte. 

Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune "Curriculum Vitae" si orice alte documente relevante/ recomandari emise de Beneficiar (Beneficiarul final al contractului) si/sau Angajator pentru fiecare contract prezentat, din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului.
