Nota 3: Punctajul se va acorda in functie de numarul de galerii, cu o lungime de minim 500 m fiecare, aferente unor tuneluri realizate prin excavatie in subteran, indiferent de numarul de contracte in care aceste lucrari de arta au fost realizate. 

Nota 4: Nu vor fi luate in considerare urmatoarele tipuri de galerii: galerii de urgenta/ de evacuare/edilitare/de legatura pietonale/ de legatura ce permit accesul auto/galerii de legatura intre galeriile tunelului.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
TUNNEL DESIGN ENGINEER: Experience held in the position of Tunnel Design Engineer within contracts for drafting and/or updating and/or reviewing and/or completing feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of road transport infrastructure (motorway/express road/national road) and/or railway transport infrastructure (including metro), which included tunnel galleries executed by underground excavation with a minimum length of 500 m each. The participation of the proposed expert in the position of Tunnel Design Engineer in contract(s) under which feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of road transport infrastructure (motorway/express road/national road) and/or railway transport infrastructure (including metro) were drafted and/or updated and/or reviewed and/or completed, which included tunnel galleries executed by underground excavation with a minimum length of 500 m each, will be scored as follows:

2 galleries with a minimum length of 500 m each: 2.5 points; 
3 galleries with a minimum length of 500 m each: 4 points; 
4 or more galleries with a minimum length of 500 m each: 5 points. 

Note 1: Tenderers shall submit a Curriculum Vitae and any other relevant documents/recommendations issued by the Beneficiary (the final beneficiary of the contract) and/or the Employer for each contract presented, from which the elements necessary for awarding the score can be evidenced. 

Note 2: For the purpose of awarding points, Technical Designs developed under design-and-build contracts will also be taken into account. 

Note 3: The scoring will be awarded based on the number of galleries, each with a minimum length of 500 m, pertaining to tunnels executed by underground excavation, regardless of the number of contracts in which these structures were executed. 

Note 4: The following types of galleries will not be taken into consideration: emergency/evacuation/utility/pedestrian connecting galleries/connecting galleries allowing vehicle access/connecting galleries between the tunnel galleries.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
CRESTEREA INCLUZIUNII SOCIALE: Principalele obiective ale Autoritatii Contractante pentru asigurarea cresterii incluziunii sociale sunt axate pe Reducerea somajului local, facilitarea accesului la munca pentru persoanele cu dizabilitati si prevenirea discriminarii pe motive de rasa, religie, dizabilitate sau sex., 1. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 5 puncte pentru ofertantii care isi asuma ca pe toata perioada executiei lucrarilor vor angaja un numar minim de 60 persoane incadrate ca someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din arealul obiectivului respectiv cu precadere din judetul Iasi si judetele limitrofe Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui si Bacău. 
2. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 3 puncte pentru ofertantii care isi asuma ca pe toata perioada executiei lucrarilor vor angaja un numar minim de 30 persoane incadrate ca someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din arealul obiectivului respectiv cu precadere din judetul Iasi si judetele limitrofe Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui, Bacău.
3. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 1 punct pentru ofertantii care isi asuma ca pe toata perioada executiei lucrarilor vor angaja un numar minim de 15 persoane incadrate ca someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din arealul obiectivului respectiv cu precadere din judetul Iasi si judetele limitrofe Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui si Bacău.
Încadrarea de someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din afara arealului specificat de autoritatea contractanta (alte judete decat cele mentionate), nu se puncteaza.

Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune o Declaratie din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului si modalitatea in care isi vor asigura accesul la aceste resurse.

Nota 2: Incadrarea de someri /personae cu dizabilitati din afara arealului specificat de Autoritatea Contractanta (alte judete decat cele mentionate), nu se punctează.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
INCREASING SOCIAL INCLUSION: The Contracting Authority’s main objectives to ensure increased social inclusion focus on reducing local unemployment, facilitating access to work for persons with disabilities, and preventing discrimination on grounds of race, religion, disability or sex.
1. The Contracting Authority awards 5 points to tenderers who commit that, throughout the execution period of the works, they will employ a minimum of 60 persons classified as unemployed/persons with disabilities from the area of the respective objective, with priority from Iași County and the neighboring counties Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui and Bacău.
2. The Contracting Authority awards 3 points to tenderers who commit that, throughout the execution period of the works, they will employ a minimum of 30 persons classified as unemployed/persons with disabilities from the area of the respective objective, with priority from Iași County and the neighboring counties Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui and Bacău.
3. The Contracting Authority awards 1 point to tenderers who commit that, throughout the execution period of the works, they will employ a minimum of 15 persons classified as unemployed/persons with disabilities from the area of the respective objective, with priority from Iași County and the neighboring counties Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui and Bacău.
Employment of unemployed persons/persons with disabilities from outside the area specified by the Contracting Authority (counties other than those mentioned) will not be scored.

Note 1: Tenderers shall submit a Declaration showing the elements required to award the score and the way in which they will ensure access to these resources.

Note 2: Employment of unemployed persons/persons with disabilities from outside the area specified by the Contracting Authority (counties other than those mentioned) will not be scored.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
EMISII DE CO2 / SCHIMBARI CLIMATICE – MATERIALE SUSTENABILE PENTRU CONSTRUCTII: Descriere criteriu:
In contextul actual, marcat de schimbarile climatice și de nevoia de sustenabilitate, industria constructiilor se confrunta cu provocarea de a reduce amprenta de carbon.  
Materialele de constructie sustenabile si tehnicile de constructie care reduc emisiile de CO2 nu contribuie doar la protectia mediului, ci ofera si beneficii pe termen lung prin eficiența energetica si reducerea costurilor de operare.
In ultimele decenii, vorbim tot mai mult despre amprenta de carbon a materialelor de constructie, in contextul dorintei generale de reducere a emisiilor de gaze cu efect de sera.
Emisii zero nete de CO2 pana în 2050: aceasta ambitie, propusa de Uniunea Europeana si de 191 de state inca de la Acordul de la Paris din 2015, impune companiilor din domeniul constructiilor - unul dintre sectoarele cu cele mai mari emisii de carbon - sa vina cu solutii noi. 
Continuare in Instructiuni catre ofertanti cap. II.2.5)., Conform criteriilor UE privind achizițiile publice ecologice pentru proiectarea, construcția și întreținerea drumurilor (https://anap.gov.ro/web/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Proiectarea-construttia-si-intretinerea-drumurilor.pdf), se va acorda punctaj maxim (5 puncte) ofertanților în cazul cărora un procent de cel puțin 3 % din totalul principalelor elemente rutiere enumerate mai jos reprezintă, ca greutate, materiale sustenabile și/sau subproduse:
•       Patul drumului, inclusiv lucrări de terasamente 
•   Stratul de forma
Conținutul de material sustenabil trebuie să se calculeze pe baza unei medii a bilanțului masic al materialelor sustenabile și/sau al subproduselor, în funcție de modul în care sunt produse și livrate pe șantier. 

Ofertantul trebuie să propună conținutul total sustenabil cuantificând contribuția proporțională a conținutului sustenabil la valoarea totală a elementelor de construcție menționate, pe baza informațiilor furnizate de producătorul (producătorii) materialului de construcție.

Materialele sustenabile reprezintă materialele realizate din materii prime provenite din resurse sustenabile și/sau reciclate și/sau regenerabile care protejază mediul și reduc amprenta de carbon, materiale pentru care există autorizare/acreditare/agrementate si/sau alte documente echivalente conform legislaţiei în vigoare.
Pentru a nu restrânge participarea operatorilor economici la procedura de achiziţie publică, Autoritatea Contractantă nu impune o listă cu materialele sustenabile, însă, cu titlu de exemplu, fără a se limita la acestea, exemplificăm: lianți hidraulici, ciment sustenabil sau alte materiale sustenabile pentru stabilizarea terasamentelor, materiale pentru care există autorizare/acreditare/agrementate si/sau alte documente echivalente conform legislaţiei în vigoare.

Se va acorda punctaj maxim ofertanților care își vor asuma, printr-o declarație pe proprie răspundere, anexată propunerii tehnice, că vor utiliza materiale sustenabile, într-un procent de cel puțin 3 % din volumul total al materialului utilizat pentru realizarea Patului drumului, inclusiv lucrări de terasamente și a Stratului de forma și va prezenta documente din care să reiasă că respectivele materiale au un impact redus asupra mediului pe durata  ciclului de viață. 
Ca și exemplu de document suport pentru materiale sustenabile nominalizăm -”Declarația de produs privind mediul (EPD)”, bazată pe standardele internaționale ISO 14025/ISO 14040/ISO 15804,  
- Analiza ciclului de viata LCA (parametrii evaluati: Emisii CO2, consum de resurse naturale, poluarea in timpul fabricatiei, utilizarii si eliminarii)
- Declaratii de conformitate de la producatori precum și orice alte documente prin care ofertantul demonstrează impactul redus al materialelor asupra mediului.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
CO2 EMISSIONS / CLIMATE CHANGE – SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS FOR CONSTRUCTION: Criterion description:
In the current context, marked by climate change and the need for sustainability, the construction industry faces the challenge of reducing its carbon footprint.
Sustainable construction materials and construction techniques that reduce CO2 emissions not only contribute to environmental protection, but also offer long-term benefits through energy efficiency and reduced operating costs.
In recent decades, there has been increasing discussion about the carbon footprint of construction materials, in the context of the general desire to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
Net zero CO2 emissions by 2050: this ambition, proposed by the European Union and by 191 states since the 2015 Paris Agreement, compels companies in the construction sector—one of the sectors with the highest carbon emissions—to come up with new solutions.
Continuation in Instructions to tenderers, Chapter II.2.5). In accordance with the EU criteria on green public procurement for the design, construction and maintenance of roads (https://anap.gov.ro/web/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Proiectarea-construttia-si-intretinerea-drumurilor.pdf), maximum points (5 points) will be awarded to tenderers for whom at least 3% of the total of the main roadway elements listed below consists, by weight, of sustainable materials and/or by-products:
• Roadbed, including earthworks
• Formation layer
The sustainable material content must be calculated based on an average mass balance of the sustainable materials and/or by-products, depending on how they are produced and delivered to the site.

The tenderer must propose the total sustainable content by quantifying the proportional contribution of the sustainable content to the total value of the specified construction elements, based on the information provided by the manufacturer(s) of the construction material.

Sustainable materials are materials made from raw materials from sustainable and/or recycled and/or renewable resources that protect the environment and reduce the carbon footprint, materials for which there is authorization/accreditation/approval and/or other equivalent documents in accordance with the legislation in force.
So as not to restrict the participation of economic operators in the public procurement procedure, the Contracting Authority does not impose a list of sustainable materials; however, by way of example, without being limited to these, we list: hydraulic binders, sustainable cement or other sustainable materials for stabilizing earthworks, materials for which there is authorization/accreditation/approval and/or other equivalent documents in accordance with the legislation in force.

Maximum points will be awarded to tenderers who undertake, through a declaration on their own responsibility attached to the technical offer, that they will use sustainable materials in a proportion of at least 3% of the total volume of material used to construct the roadbed, including earthworks, and the formation layer, and who present documents showing that the respective materials have a reduced environmental impact over their life cycle.
As examples of supporting documents for the nominated sustainable materials we list: the Environmental Product Declaration (EPD), based on international standards ISO 14025/ISO 14040/ISO 15804; Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) (parameters evaluated: CO2 emissions, consumption of natural resources, pollution during manufacture, use and disposal); declarations of conformity from manufacturers, as well as any other documents by which the tenderer demonstrates the reduced environmental impact of the materials.

criteria from actual contract in origina:
Metodologia de realizare a contractului si planificarea resurselor tehnice si umane in corelare cu specificul si complexitatea activitatilor: Descriere, reprezentarea grafica si planificarea activitatilor contractului in corelare cu resursele tehnice si umane raportat la specificul si complexitatea activitatilor., 1. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 17 puncte pentru ofertantii care prezinta o metodologie de implementare a contractului care demonstreaza o foarte buna intelegere a activitatilor stabilite in Cerintele Beneficiarului, precum si o buna documentare/ analiza a proiectului.Pentru obtinerea punctajului maxim de 17 puncte, vor fi utilizate ambele tipuri de mijloace de transport „prietenos cu mediul”. 
În vederea obtinerii punctajului maxim ofertanul va prezenta la momentul depunerii ofertelor o declarație prin care își va asuma că va utiliza un număr de minim 2 buc. de mijloace de transport rutier sustenabil, din cele 36 autobasculante mentionate in FDA. Totodata va prezenta documente justificative care sa ateste ca are la dispozitie/ are acces la cele 2 autobasculante: tipul utilajului, producatorul si modelul utilajului, seria si numarul utilajului. Aceste documente vor fi prezentate si de catre ofertantul asociat, in situatia in care resursele acestuia au fost luate in considerare pentru indeplinirea cerintei.
2. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 13 puncte pentru ofertantii care prezinta o metodologie de implementare a contractului care demonstreaza o buna intelegere a activitatilor stabilite in Cerintele Beneficiarului.
3. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 10 puncte pentru ofertantii care prezinta o metodologie de implementare a contractului care demonstreaza o intelegere limitata atat a sub-activitatilor care compun activitatile de proiectare si executie prevazute in Cerintele Beneficiarului, cat si in ceea ce priveste corelarea acestora cu resursele tehnice si umane necesare realizarii contractului.
Completare in sectiunea II.2.5) - Criterii de atribuire  instructiuni pentru ofertanti.
criteria from actural contract translate:
Methodology for carrying out the contract and planning technical and human resources in correlation with the specificity and complexity of the activities: Description, graphical representation and scheduling of the contract activities correlated with the technical and human resources, in relation to the specificity and complexity of the activities.
1. The Contracting Authority awards 17 points to tenderers who present a contract implementation methodology that demonstrates a very good understanding of the activities established in the Beneficiary’s Requirements, as well as good documentation/analysis of the project. To obtain the maximum score of 17 points, both types of “environmentally friendly” means of transport will be used.
In order to obtain the maximum score, the tenderer will submit, at the time of tender submission, a declaration undertaking to use a minimum of 2 units of sustainable road transport means, out of the 36 dump trucks mentioned in the TDS (FDA). At the same time, it will present supporting documents attesting that it has at its disposal/has access to the 2 dump trucks: type of equipment, manufacturer and model of the equipment, serial and number of the equipment. These documents will also be presented by the associated tenderer, if its resources have been taken into account for meeting the requirement.
2. The Contracting Authority awards 13 points to tenderers who present a contract implementation methodology that demonstrates a good understanding of the activities established in the Beneficiary’s Requirements.
3. The Contracting Authority awards 10 points to tenderers who present a contract implementation methodology that demonstrates a limited understanding both of the sub-activities that make up the design and execution activities provided in the Beneficiary’s Requirements, and of the correlation of these with the technical and human resources necessary for performance of the contract.
Addition in section II.2.5) – Award criteria – instructions for tenderers.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. Points are awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Utilizarea BIM (Building Information Modelling) in cadrul activitatilor care fac obiectul Contractului: Utilizarea BIM (Building Information Modelling) in cadrul activitatilor care fac obiectul Contractului, Autoritatea contractanta acorda 6 puncte Ofertantilor care isi asuma utilizarea BIM in toate etapele contractului, in caz contrar nu se va acorda punctaj.
Nota 1: În vederea îndeplinirii cerintei referitoare la Utilizarea BIM (Building Information Modelling), ofertanții vor prezenta o declarație prin care își asumă utilizarea BIM atât pe perioada de proiectare cât și pe perioda de execuție. Totodată, în cadrul Metodologiei de realizare a contractului și planificarea resurselor tehnice, Ofertanții vor descrie modul în care vor utiliza BIM pe întreaga perioada de realizare a contractului.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Use of BIM (Building Information Modelling) within the activities that are the subject of the Contract: The contracting authority awards 6 points to bidders who commit to using BIM at all stages of the contract; otherwise, no points will be awarded.
Note 1: To meet the requirement regarding the use of BIM (Building Information Modelling), bidders will submit a statement by which they commit to using BIM both during the design phase and during the execution phase. Additionally, within the Methodology for carrying out the contract and the planning of technical resources, bidders will describe how they will use BIM throughout the entire period of performance of the contract.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Cresterea incluziunii sociale: Descriere criteriu: Principalele obiective ale Autoritatii Contractante pentru asigurarea cresterii incluziunii sociale sunt axate pe Reducerea somajului local, facilitarea accesului la munca pentru persoanele cu dizabilitati si prevenirea discriminarii pe motive de rasa, relizgie, dizabilitate sau sex., Algoritm de calcul: 
1. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 5 puncte pentru ofertantii care isi asuma ca pe toata perioada executiei lucrarilor vor angaja un numar minim de 30 persoane incadrate ca someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din arealul obiectivului respectiv cu precadere din judetul Iasi, si judetele limitrofe Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui si Bacău. 
2. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 3 puncte pentru ofertantii care isi asuma ca pe toata perioada executiei lucrarilor vor angaja un numar minim de 20 persoane incadrate ca someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din arealul obiectivului respectiv cu precadere din judetul Iasi, si judetele limitrofe Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui, Bacău.
3. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 1 punct pentru ofertantii care isi asuma ca pe toata perioada executiei lucrarilor vor angaja un numar minim de 10 persoane incadrate ca someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din arealul obiectivului respectiv cu precadere din judetul Iasi, si judetele limitrofe Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui si Bacău.
Incadrarea de someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din afara arealului specificat de autoritatea contractanta (alte judete decat cele mentionate), nu se puncteaza.
Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune o Declaratie din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului si modalitatea in care isi vor asigura accesul la aceste resurse.
Nota 2: Incadrarea de someri /personae cu dizabilitati din afara arealului specificat de Autoritatea Contractanta (alte judete decat cele mentionate), nu se punctează.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Increasing social inclusion: Criterion description: The main objectives of the Contracting Authority to ensure increased social inclusion are focused on reducing local unemployment, facilitating access to work for persons with disabilities, and preventing discrimination on grounds of race, religion, disability or sex. Calculation algorithm:
1. The Contracting Authority awards 5 points to tenderers who undertake that, for the entire duration of the execution of the works, they will employ a minimum of 30 persons classified as unemployed/people with disabilities from the area of the respective objective, preferably from Iași County and the neighboring counties Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui and Bacău.
2. The Contracting Authority awards 3 points to tenderers who undertake that, for the entire duration of the execution of the works, they will employ a minimum of 20 persons classified as unemployed/people with disabilities from the area of the respective objective, preferably from Iași County and the neighboring counties Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui and Bacău.
3. The Contracting Authority awards 1 point to tenderers who undertake that, for the entire duration of the execution of the works, they will employ a minimum of 10 persons classified as unemployed/people with disabilities from the area of the respective objective, preferably from Iași County and the neighboring counties Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui and Bacău.
Hiring unemployed/people with disabilities from outside the area specified by the Contracting Authority (counties other than those mentioned) is not scored.
Note 1: Tenderers shall submit a Declaration showing the elements necessary for awarding the score and the manner in which they will secure access to these resources.
Note 2: Hiring unemployed/people with disabilities from outside the area specified by the Contracting Authority (counties other than those mentioned) is not scored.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Experienta detinuta de INGINERUL PROIECTANT DE PODURI: Descriere criteriu: Experienta detinuta in pozitia de Inginer proiectant de poduri si/ sau Inginer proiectant structuri si/ sau Inginer Lucrari de Arta in contract/contracte in cadrul caruia/carora au fost elaborate si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau autostrazi si/sau drumuri expres care au inclus poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 100 metri fiecare., Participarea expertului propus in pozitia de Inginer proiectant de poduri si/ sau Inginer proiectant structuri si/ sau Inginer Lucrari de Arta in contract/contracte in caruia/cadrul carora au fost elaborate si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau autostrazi si/sau drumuri expres care au inclus poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 100 metri fiecare, se va puncta astfel: 

2 poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 100 metri fiecare: 3,5 puncte; 
3 poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 100 metri fiecare: 5 puncte; 
4 sau mai multe poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 100 metri fiecare: 6 puncte

Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune Anexa nr. 1 la Formularul nr. 4 "Curriculum Vitae" si orice alte documente relevante (fisa de post/contract de munca)/ recomandari emise de Beneficiar (Beneficiarul final al contractului) si/sau Angajator pentru fiecare contract prezentat, din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului.
Nota 2: In vederea acordarii punctajului vor fi luate in considerare si Proiectele Tehnice elaborate in cadrul unor contracte de proiectare si executie. 
Nota 3: Punctajul se va acorda in functie de numarul de poduri/pasaje/viaducte, cu o lungime de minim 100 metri fiecare, indiferent de numarul de contracte in care aceste lucrari de arta au fost realizate. 
Nota 4: In vederea acordarii punctajului se accepta si prezentarea unor contracte in cadrul carora expertul sa fi detinut pozitia de Inginer proiectant de poduri si/ sau Inginer proiectant structuri si/ sau Inginer Lucrari de Arta, de elaborare si/sau revizuire si/sau actualizare de Studii de Fezabilitate si/sau Proiecte Tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/sau largire de poduri si/sau pasaje si/sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 100 metri fiecare aferente unor drumuri nationale si/sau autostrazi si/sau drumuri expres.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Experience held by the BRIDGE DESIGN ENGINEER: Criterion description: Experience held in the position of bridge design engineer and/or structural design engineer and/or engineer for civil engineering structures in contract(s) within which feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or motorways and/or express roads that included bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts, each with a length of at least 100 meters, were prepared and/or updated and/or revised. The participation of the proposed expert in the position of bridge design engineer and/or structural design engineer and/or engineer for civil engineering structures in contract(s) within which feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or motorways and/or express roads that included bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts, each with a length of at least 100 meters, were prepared and/or updated and/or revised, will be scored as follows:

2 bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts with a length of at least 100 meters each: 3.5 points;
3 bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts with a length of at least 100 meters each: 5 points;
4 or more bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts with a length of at least 100 meters each: 6 points.

Note 1: Bidders shall submit Annex no. 1 to Form no. 4 "Curriculum Vitae" and any other relevant documents (job description/employment contract)/recommendations issued by the Beneficiary (the final beneficiary of the contract) and/or the Employer for each presented contract, from which the elements necessary for awarding the score shall result.
Note 2: For the purpose of awarding the score, Technical Designs prepared within design-and-build contracts will also be taken into account.
Note 3: The score will be awarded based on the number of bridges/overpasses/viaducts, each with a length of at least 100 meters, regardless of the number of contracts in which these civil engineering structures were carried out.
Note 4: For the purpose of awarding the score, it is also acceptable to present contracts within which the expert held the position of bridge design engineer and/or structural design engineer and/or engineer for civil engineering structures, for the preparation and/or revision and/or updating of Feasibility Studies and/or Technical Designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts, each with a length of at least 100 meters, pertaining to national roads and/or motorways and/or express roads.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Experienta detinuta de MANAGERUL DE PROIECT: Descriere criteriu: Experienta detinuta in pozitia de Manager Proiect si/sau Director Proiect si/sau Coordonator Proiect si/ sau Adjunct Director Proiect si/sau Adjunct Manager Proiect si/sau Adjunct Coordonator Proiect in cadrul unor contracte de supervizare executie lucrari si/sau supervizare proiectare si executie lucrari si/sau executie lucrari si/sau proiectare si executie lucrari de constructie noua si/ sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau drumuri expres si/ sau autostrazi., Participarea expertului propus in pozitia de Manager Proiect si/sau Director Proiect si/sau Coordonator Proiect si/sau Adjunct Director Proiect si/sau Adjunct Manager Proiect si/sau Adjunct Coordonator Proiect in cadrul unor contracte de supervizare executie lucrari si/sau supervizare proiectare si executie lucrari si/sau executie lucrari si/sau proiectare si executie lucrari de constructie noua si/ sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau drumuri expres si/sau autostrazi, se va puncta astfel: 
participarea in 2 contracte: 4,5 puncte
participarea in 3 contracte: 6 puncte
participarea in 4 sau mai mult de 4 contracte: 8 puncte

Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune Anexa nr. 1 la Formularul nr. 4 "Curriculum Vitae" si orice alte documente relevante (fisa de post/contract de munca)/ recomandari emise de Beneficiar (Beneficiarul final al contractului) si/sau Angajator pentru fiecare contract prezentat, din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului.

 Completare in sectiunea II.2.5) - Criterii de atribuire din Instructiuni pentru ofertanti.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Experience of the PROJECT MANAGER: Criterion description: Experience held in the position of Project Manager and/or Project Director and/or Project Coordinator and/or Deputy Project Director and/or Deputy Project Manager and/or Deputy Project Coordinator within contracts for supervision of works execution and/or supervision of design and execution of works and/or execution of works and/or design and execution of works for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or expressways and/or motorways. The participation of the proposed expert in the position of Project Manager and/or Project Director and/or Project Coordinator and/or Deputy Project Director and/or Deputy Project Manager and/or Deputy Project Coordinator within contracts for supervision of works execution and/or supervision of design and execution of works and/or execution of works and/or design and execution of works for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or expressways and/or motorways will be scored as follows:
participation in 2 contracts: 4.5 points
participation in 3 contracts: 6 points
participation in 4 or more contracts: 8 points

Note 1: Tenderers shall submit Annex no. 1 to Form no. 4 "Curriculum Vitae" and any other relevant documents (job description/employment contract)/recommendations issued by the Beneficiary (the final beneficiary of the contract) and/or the Employer for each contract presented, from which the elements necessary for awarding the score can be determined.

Addition in section II.2.5) - Award criteria from the Instructions to tenderers.

match: No match (environmental sustainability/climate criterion; not included in provided social model categories A, B, C, E, F)
criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Emisii de CO2 / Schimbari climatice – Materiale sustenabile pentru constructii: In contextul actual, marcat de schimbarile climatice și de nevoia de sustenabilitate, industria constructiilor se confrunta cu provocarea de a reduce amprenta de carbon.  
Materialele de constructie sustenabile si tehnicile de constructie care reduc emisiile de CO2 nu contribuie doar la protectia mediului, ci ofera si beneficii pe termen lung prin eficiența energetica si reducerea costurilor de operare.
In ultimele decenii, vorbim tot mai mult despre amprenta de carbon a materialelor de constructie, in contextul dorintei generale de reducere a emisiilor de gaze cu efect de sera.
Emisii zero nete de CO2 pana în 2050: aceasta ambitie, propusa de Uniunea Europeana si de 191 de state inca de la Acordul de la Paris din 2015, impune companiilor din domeniul constructiilor - unul dintre sectoarele cu cele mai mari emisii de carbon - sa vina cu solutii noi. Continuare in Instructiuni pentru ofertanti cap.II.2.5 Criterii de atribuire., Conform criteriilor UE privind achizițiile publice ecologice pentru proiectarea, construcția și întreținerea drumurilor (https://anap.gov.ro/web/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Proiectarea-construttia-si-intretinerea-drumurilor.pdf), se va acorda punctaj maxim (5 puncte) ofertanților în cazul cărora un procent de cel puțin 3 % din totalul principalelor elemente rutiere enumerate mai jos reprezintă, ca greutate, materiale sustenabile și/sau subproduse:
•   Patul drumului, inclusiv lucrări de terasamente 
•   Stratul de forma
Conținutul de material sustenabil trebuie să se calculeze pe baza unei medii a bilanțului masic al materialelor sustenabile și/sau al subproduselor, în funcție de modul în care sunt produse și livrate pe șantier. 

Ofertantul trebuie să propună conținutul total sustenabil cuantificând contribuția proporțională a conținutului sustenabil la valoarea totală a elementelor de construcție menționate, pe baza informațiilor furnizate de producătorul (producătorii) materialului de construcție.

Materialele sustenabile reprezintă materialele realizate din materii prime provenite din resurse sustenabile și/sau reciclate și/sau regenerabile care protejază mediul și reduc amprenta de carbon, materiale pentru care există autorizare/acreditare/agrementate si/sau alte documente echivalente conform legislaţiei în vigoare.

Pentru a nu restrânge participarea operatorilor economici la procedura de achiziţie publică, Autoritatea Contractantă nu impune o listă cu materialele sustenabile, însă, cu titlu de exemplu, fără a se limita la acestea, exemplificăm: lianți hidraulici, ciment sustenabil sau alte materiale sustenabile pentru stabilizarea terasamentelor, materiale pentru care există autorizare/acreditare/agrementate si/sau alte documente echivalente conform legislaţiei în vigoare.

Se va acorda punctaj maxim ofertanților care își vor asuma, printr-o declarație pe proprie răspundere, anexată propunerii tehnice, că vor utiliza materiale sustenabile, într-un procent de cel puțin 3 % din volumul total al materialului utilizat pentru realizarea Patului drumului, inclusiv lucrări de terasamente și a Stratului de forma și va prezenta documente din care să reiasă că respectivele materiale au un impact redus asupra mediului pe durata  ciclului de viață. 
Ca și exemplu de document suport pentru materiale sustenabile nominalizăm -”Declarația de produs privind mediul (EPD)”, bazată pe standardele internaționale ISO 14025/ISO 14040/ISO 15804,  
- Analiza ciclului de viata LCA (parametrii evaluati: Emisii CO2, consum de resurse naturale, poluarea in timpul fabricatiei, utilizarii si eliminarii)
- Declaratii de conformitate de la producatori precum și orice alte documente prin care ofertantul demonstrează impactul redus al materialelor asupra mediului.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
CO2 emissions / Climate change – Sustainable construction materials: In the current context, marked by climate change and the need for sustainability, the construction industry faces the challenge of reducing its carbon footprint.
Sustainable construction materials and construction techniques that reduce CO2 emissions not only contribute to environmental protection, but also offer long-term benefits through energy efficiency and reduced operating costs.
In recent decades, there has been increasing discussion of the carbon footprint of construction materials, in the context of the general desire to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
Net zero CO2 emissions by 2050: this ambition, proposed by the European Union and by 191 states since the 2015 Paris Agreement, compels companies in the construction sector—one of the sectors with the highest carbon emissions—to come up with new solutions. Continued in Instructions for Bidders chap. II.2.5 Award criteria. In accordance with the EU criteria on green public procurement for the design, construction and maintenance of roads (https://anap.gov.ro/web/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Proiectarea-construttia-si-intretinerea-drumurilor.pdf), the maximum score (5 points) will be awarded to bidders for whom at least 3% of the total of the main road elements listed below, by weight, consists of sustainable materials and/or by-products:
• Roadbed, including earthworks
• Formation layer
The sustainable material content must be calculated based on an average of the mass balance of sustainable materials and/or by-products, depending on how they are produced and delivered to the site.

The bidder must propose the total sustainable content by quantifying the proportional contribution of the sustainable content to the total value of the construction elements mentioned, based on information provided by the construction material manufacturer(s).

Sustainable materials are materials made from raw materials derived from sustainable and/or recycled and/or renewable resources that protect the environment and reduce the carbon footprint, materials for which there is authorization/accreditation/technical approval and/or other equivalent documents in accordance with the legislation in force.

In order not to restrict the participation of economic operators in the public procurement procedure, the Contracting Authority does not impose a list of sustainable materials; however, by way of example, without being limited to these, we exemplify: hydraulic binders, sustainable cement, or other sustainable materials for stabilization of earthworks, materials for which there is authorization/accreditation/technical approval and/or other equivalent documents in accordance with the legislation in force.

The maximum score will be awarded to bidders who undertake, through a self-declaration attached to the technical proposal, that they will use sustainable materials in a percentage of at least 3% of the total volume of material used for the construction of the roadbed, including earthworks, and of the formation layer, and who will present documents showing that these materials have a reduced environmental impact over their life cycle.
As examples of supporting documents for sustainable materials we nominate: the Environmental Product Declaration (EPD), based on international standards ISO 14025/ISO 14040/ISO 15804,
- Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) (parameters evaluated: CO2 emissions, consumption of natural resources, pollution during manufacturing, use and disposal)
- Declarations of conformity from manufacturers, as well as any other documents by which the bidder demonstrates the reduced environmental impact of the materials.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Experienta detinuta de SEFUL ECHIPEI DE PROIECTARE: Descriere criteriu: Experienta detinuta in pozitia de Coordonator Proiect si/ sau Director Proiect si/ sau Manager Proiect si/ sau Adjunct Coordonator Proiect si/ sau Adjunct Director Proiect si/ sau Adjunct Manager Proiect si/ sau Sef echipa proiectare si/ sau Adjunct Sef Echipa proiectare si/ sau Sef Proiect si/ sau Adjunct Sef Proiect in contracte in cadrul carora au fost elaborate si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau drumuri expres si/sau autostrazi, Participarea expertului propus in pozitia de Coordonator Proiect si/ sau Director Proiect si/ sau Manager Proiect si/ sau Adjunct Coordonator Proiect si/ sau Adjunct Director Proiect si/ sau Adjunct Manager Proiect si/ sau Sef echipa proiectare si/ sau Adjunct Sef Echipa proiectare si/ sau Sef Proiect si/ sau Adjunct Sef Proiect in contracte in cadrul carora au fost elaborate si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau drumuri expres si/sau autostrazi, se va puncta astfel: 

participarea in 2 contracte: 4 puncte
participarea in 3 contracte: 5,5 puncte
participarea in 4 sau mai mult de 4 contracte: 7 puncte

Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune Anexa nr. 1 la Formularul nr. 4 "Curriculum Vitae" si orice alte documente relevante (fisa de post/contract de munca)/ recomandari emise de Beneficiar (Beneficiarul final al contractului) si/sau Angajator pentru fiecare contract prezentat, din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului..
Nota 2: In vederea acordarii punctajului vor fi luate in considerare si Proiectele Tehnice elaborate in cadrul unor contracte de proiectare si executie.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Experience of the DESIGN TEAM LEADER: Criterion description: Experience held in the position of Project Coordinator and/or Project Director and/or Project Manager and/or Deputy Project Coordinator and/or Deputy Project Director and/or Deputy Project Manager and/or Design Team Leader and/or Deputy Design Team Leader and/or Project Leader and/or Deputy Project Leader in contracts under which feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or express roads and/or motorways were prepared and/or updated and/or revised. The participation of the proposed expert in the position of Project Coordinator and/or Project Director and/or Project Manager and/or Deputy Project Coordinator and/or Deputy Project Director and/or Deputy Project Manager and/or Design Team Leader and/or Deputy Design Team Leader and/or Project Leader and/or Deputy Project Leader in contracts under which feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or express roads and/or motorways were prepared and/or updated and/or revised will be scored as follows:

participation in 2 contracts: 4 points
participation in 3 contracts: 5.5 points
participation in 4 or more contracts: 7 points

Note 1: Tenderers shall submit Annex no. 1 to Form no. 4 “Curriculum Vitae” and any other relevant documents (job description/employment contract)/recommendations issued by the Beneficiary (the final Beneficiary of the contract) and/or the Employer for each contract presented, from which the elements necessary for awarding the score shall result.
Note 2: For the purpose of awarding the score, Technical Designs prepared within design-and-build contracts shall also be taken into account.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Experienta Inginerului Proiectant Drumuri: Descriere criteriu: : Experienta detinuta in pozitia de Inginer Proiectant Drumuri in cadrul unor contracte de elaborare si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau drumuri expres si/sau autostrazi, Participarea expertului propus in pozitia de Inginer Proiectant Drumuri in cadrul unor contracte de de elaborare si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau drumuri expres si/sau autostrazi, se va puncta astfel: 
participarea in 2 contracte: 3,5 puncte
participarea in 3 contracte: 5 puncte
participarea in 4 sau mai mult de 4 contracte: 6 puncte

Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune Anexa nr. 1 la Formularul nr. 4 "Curriculum Vitae" si orice alte documente relevante (fisa de post/contract de munca)/ recomandari emise de Beneficiar (Beneficiarul final al contractului) si/sau Angajator pentru fiecare contract prezentat, din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului.
Nota 2: In vederea acordarii punctajului vor fi luate in considerare si Proiectele Tehnice elaborate in cadrul unor contracte de proiectare si executie.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Experience of the Road Design Engineer: Criterion description: Experience held in the position of Road Design Engineer within contracts for drafting and/or updating and/or reviewing feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or express roads and/or motorways. The participation of the proposed expert in the position of Road Design Engineer within contracts for drafting and/or updating and/or reviewing feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or express roads and/or motorways will be scored as follows: 
- participation in 2 contracts: 3.5 points
- participation in 3 contracts: 5 points
- participation in 4 or more contracts: 6 points

Note 1: Tenderers shall submit Annex no. 1 to Form no. 4 "Curriculum Vitae" and any other relevant documents (job description/employment contract)/recommendations issued by the Beneficiary (the final Beneficiary of the contract) and/or the Employer for each contract presented, from which the elements necessary for awarding the score shall result.
Note 2: For the purpose of awarding the score, Technical Designs prepared under design-and-build contracts will also be taken into account.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. The scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated points; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated points.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Componenta tehnică - PT2: Perioada de garanție și mentenanță gratuită, suplimentară față de perioada minima de garanție și mentenanță gratuită solicitată în Caietul de sarcini (PT2), Perioada de garanție și mentenanță gratuită este  minim 36 luni, de la data Procesului Verbal de Recepție la Terminarea Lucrărilor. 
Pentru oferta cu o perioada de garantie și mentenanță gratuită de 36 luni se acordă 0 puncte.  
Pentru oferta cu o perioada de garantie și mentenanță gratuită, suplimentară de 12 luni se acordă 10 puncte. 
Pentru oferta cu o perioada de garantie și mentenanță gratuită, suplimentară de 24 luni se acordă 20 puncte.  
Pentru o perioada de garantie și mentenanță gratuită mai mare de 60 luni nu se puncteaza suplimentar fata de punctajul maxim. 
Pentru oferta a carei perioada de garantie și mentenanță gratuită este egala cu perioada de garantie și mentenanță gratuită minima acceptata de beneficiar – 36 luni, nu se acorda punctaj. Perioada de garantie se va exprima in luni. 
Pentru o alta perioada de garantie acordată produselor se acorda punctajul conform formulei: 
 Pg = [PGn/PGmax ] x 20 Unde: 
-   Pg = punctaj pentru  perioada de garantie a ofertei n 
-   PGmax = cea mai mare perioada de garantie acordata, dintre ofertele admisibile  
PGn = perioada de garantie acordata a ofertei n

Modalitatea prin care se aplica punctajul este detaliată in Caietul de Sarcini.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Technical component - PT2: Warranty and free maintenance period, additional to the minimum warranty and free maintenance period requested in the Specifications (PT2). The warranty and free maintenance period is at least 36 months from the date of the Acceptance Report at Completion of Works.
For an offer with a warranty and free maintenance period of 36 months, 0 points are awarded.
For an offer with an additional 12 months of warranty and free maintenance, 10 points are awarded.
For an offer with an additional 24 months of warranty and free maintenance, 20 points are awarded.
For a warranty and free maintenance period greater than 60 months, no additional points are awarded beyond the maximum score.
For an offer whose warranty and free maintenance period is equal to the minimum warranty and free maintenance period accepted by the beneficiary – 36 months, no score is awarded. The warranty period will be expressed in months.
For any other warranty period granted to the products, the score is awarded according to the formula:
Pg = [PGn/PGmax] x 20 Where:
- Pg = score for the warranty period of offer n
- PGmax = the largest warranty period granted among the admissible offers
- PGn = the warranty period granted for offer n

The method by which the scoring is applied is detailed in the Specifications.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Componenta tehnica - PT3: Gradul de adecvare al graficului general de realizare a investiției (durata, succesiunea activităților și inter-relaționarea acestora, inclusiv drumul critic, identificarea punctelor cheie de control (jaloanelor)), resursele alocate pentru realizarea activităților în cadrul Contractului prin raportare la metodologia de executare a lucrărilor  (PT3), S-au stabilit 6 subfactori de evaluare, însumând un punctaj maxim de 15 puncte, în cazul obținerii unui calificativ "foarte bine" pentru fiecare subfactor de evaluare, modul de aplicare al punctajului este descris in Anexa – Algoritm de calcul PT3
 Punctajul individual obținut la acest factor de evaluare de către un ofertant cu oferta admisibilă se va calcula prin utilizarea raţionamentului de evaluare a ofertelor descris in  Caietul de Sarcini (Anexa-Algoritm de calcul PT3)
Algoritm de calcul: 
Calificativ "foarte bine"  = 2,5 puncte /subfactor de evaluare: Foarte bine  -15 puncte 
Calificativ "bine" = 1,5 puncte /subfactor de evaluare: Bine  - 9 puncte
Calificativ "satisfacator" = 0,5 puncte /subfactor de evaluare: Satisfăcător - 3 puncte
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Technical component – PT3: The degree of adequacy of the overall schedule for carrying out the investment (duration, sequence of activities and their interrelationship, including the critical path, identification of key control points (milestones)), the resources allocated for performing the activities under the Contract in relation to the methodology for executing the works (PT3). Six evaluation sub-factors have been established, totaling a maximum score of 15 points; if a "very good" rating is obtained for each evaluation sub-factor, the method of applying the score is described in the Annex – PT3 Calculation Algorithm.
The individual score obtained for this evaluation factor by a tenderer with an admissible offer will be calculated using the reasoning for evaluating the offers described in the Specifications (Annex – PT3 Calculation Algorithm).
Calculation algorithm:
Rating "very good" = 2.5 points per evaluation sub-factor: Very good – 15 points
Rating "good" = 1.5 points per evaluation sub-factor: Good – 9 points
Rating "satisfactory" = 0.5 points per evaluation sub-factor: Satisfactory – 3 points

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Componenta tehnica - PT4: Demonstrarea unei metodologii corespunzătoare pentru obținerea asigurării că activitățile și rezultatele sunt realizate la parametrii calitativi solicitați (Planul de management/gestionare a calității în cadrul Contractului) (PT4), Descriere: S-au stabilit 4 subfactori de evaluare, însumând un punctaj maxim de 16 puncte, în cazul obținerii unui calificativ "foarte bine" pentru fiecare subfactor de evaluare, modul de aplicare al punctajului este descris in Caietul de Sarcini ( Anexa – Algoritm de calcul PT4)
 Punctajul individual obținut la acest factor de evaluare de către un ofertant cu oferta admisibilă se va calcula prin utilizarea raţionamentului de evaluare a ofertelor descris in Anexa-Algoritm de calcul PT4
Algoritm de calcul: 
Calificativ "foarte bine"  = 4 puncte /subfactor de evaluare: Foarte bine  -16 puncte 
Calificativ "bine" = 2 puncte /subfactor de evaluare: Bine  - 8 puncte
Calificativ "satisfacator" = 1 puncte /subfactor de evaluare: Satisfăcător - 4 puncte
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Technical component - PT4: Demonstration of an appropriate methodology to ensure that the activities and results are achieved at the required quality parameters (Quality management/management plan within the Contract) (PT4). Description: Four evaluation sub-factors have been established, totaling a maximum of 16 points if a “very good” rating is obtained for each evaluation sub-factor. The method of applying the scoring is described in the Terms of Reference (Annex – PT4 calculation algorithm).
The individual score obtained for this evaluation factor by a tenderer with an admissible offer will be calculated using the offer evaluation rationale described in the Annex – PT4 calculation algorithm.
Calculation algorithm:
Rating “very good” = 4 points per evaluation sub-factor: Very good – 16 points
Rating “good” = 2 points per evaluation sub-factor: Good – 8 points
Rating “satisfactory” = 1 point per evaluation sub-factor: Satisfactory – 4 points

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Metodologia de realizare a contractului si planificarea resurselor tehnice si umane in corelare cu specificul si complexitatea activitatilor: Descriere, reprezentarea grafica si planificarea activitatilor contractului in corelare cu resursele tehnice si umane raportat la specificul si complexitatea activitatilor., 1. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 16 puncte pentru ofertantii care prezinta o metodologie de implementare a contractului care demonstreaza o foarte buna intelegere a activitatilor stabilite in Cerintele Beneficiarului, precum si o buna documentare/ analiza a proiectului. În vederea obtinerii punctajului maxim de 16 puncte, vor fi utilizate ambele tipuri de mijloace de transport „prietenos cu mediul”. Ofertanul va prezenta o declarație prin care își va asuma că va utiliza ca număr de mijloace de transport rutier sustenabil, minim 4 Autobasculante cu propulsie electrica și/sau hibridă.Documente justificative în privinta accesului la aceste utilaje pot fi fără a se limita la acestea: documente de proprietate, inchiriere, comodat etc.și vor fi prezentate la momentul depunerii ofertei in SEAP, în vederea obtinerii punctajului maxim de 16 puncte.

2. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 12 puncte pentru ofertantii care prezinta o metodologie de implementare a contractului care demonstreaza o buna intelegere a activitatilor stabilite in Cerintele Beneficiarului.
3. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 9 puncte pentru ofertantii care prezinta o metodologie de implementare a contractului care demonstreaza o intelegere limitata atat a sub-activitatilor care compun activitatile de proiectare si executie prevazute in Cerintele Beneficiarului, cat si in ceea ce priveste corelarea acestora cu resursele tehnice si umane necesare realizarii contractului.
Completare in sectiunea II.2.5) - Criterii de atribuire  instructiuni pentru ofertanti.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Methodology for carrying out the contract and planning of technical and human resources in correlation with the specific nature and complexity of the activities: Description, graphical representation and scheduling of the contract activities correlated with the technical and human resources, in relation to the specific nature and complexity of the activities.

1. The Contracting Authority awards 16 points to tenderers who present a contract implementation methodology that demonstrates a very good understanding of the activities established in the Beneficiary’s Requirements, as well as good documentation/analysis of the project. In order to obtain the maximum score of 16 points, both types of “environmentally friendly” means of transport shall be used. The tenderer shall submit a statement undertaking to use, as the number of sustainable road transport means, at least 4 tipper trucks with electric and/or hybrid propulsion. Supporting documents regarding access to these equipment may include, without being limited to: ownership documents, lease, loan for use (comodat), etc., and shall be submitted at the time of bid submission in SEAP, in order to obtain the maximum score of 16 points.

2. The Contracting Authority awards 12 points to tenderers who present a contract implementation methodology that demonstrates a good understanding of the activities established in the Beneficiary’s Requirements.

3. The Contracting Authority awards 9 points to tenderers who present a contract implementation methodology that demonstrates a limited understanding both of the sub‑activities that make up the design and execution activities provided for in the Beneficiary’s Requirements, and of the way these are correlated with the technical and human resources necessary for performing the contract.

Addition in section II.2.5) – Award criteria — instructions for tenderers.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated: Offer price: Financial component. Points are awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Utilizarea BIM (Building Information Modelling) in cadrul activitatilor care fac obiectul Contractului: Utilizarea BIM (Building Information Modelling) in cadrul activitatilor care fac obiectul Contractului, Autoritatea contractanta acorda 6 puncte Ofertantilor care isi asuma utilizarea BIM in toate etapele contractului, in caz contrar nu se va acorda punctaj.
Nota 1: În vederea îndeplinirii cerintei referitoare la Utilizarea BIM (Building Information Modelling), ofertanții vor prezenta o declarație prin care își asumă utilizarea BIM atât pe perioada de proiectare cât și pe perioda de execuție. Totodată, în cadrul Metodologiei de realizare a contractului și planificarea resurselor tehnice, Ofertanții vor descrie modul în care vor utiliza BIM pe întreaga perioada de realizare a contractului.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Use of BIM (Building Information Modelling) within the activities that are the subject of the Contract: The Contracting Authority awards 6 points to bidders who commit to using BIM at all stages of the contract; otherwise, no points will be awarded.
Note 1: In order to meet the requirement regarding the use of BIM (Building Information Modelling), bidders shall submit a declaration by which they commit to using BIM both during the design period and the execution period. Also, within the Methodology for carrying out the contract and the planning of technical resources, bidders shall describe how they will use BIM throughout the entire duration of the contract.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Experienta Inginer Proiectant Tuneluri: Descriere criteriu: : Experienta detinuta in pozitia de Inginer Proiectant Tuneluri in cadrul unor contracte de elaborare si/sau actualizare si/sau revizuire si/sau completatre studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de infrastructura de transport rutier (autostrada/ drum expres/drum national) si/ sau infrastructura de transport feroviar (inclusiv metrou) care au inclus galerii de tunel realizate prin excavatie in subteran cu o lungime minima de 300 m fiecare., Participarea expertului propus in pozitia de Inginer proiectant de tuneluri in contract/contracte in cadrul caruia/carora au fost elaborate si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite si/sau completate studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de infrastructura de transport rutier (autostrada/ drum expres/drum national) si/ sau infrastructura de transport feroviar (inclusiv metrou) care au inclus galerii de tunel realizate prin excavatie in subteran cu o lungime minima de 300 m fiecare, se va puncta astfel: 

2 galerii cu o lungime de minim 300 m fiecare: 2,5 puncte; 
3 galerii cu o lungime de minim 300 m fiecare: 4 puncte; 
4 sau mai multe galerii cu o lungime de minim 300 m fiecare: 5 puncte. 

Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune "Curriculum Vitae" si orice alte documente relevante/ recomandari emise de Beneficiar (Beneficiarul final al contractului) si/sau Angajator pentru fiecare contract prezentat, din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului. 
Nota 2: In vederea acordarii punctajului vor fi luate in considerare si Proiectele Tehnice elaborate in cadrul unor contracte de proiectare si executie. 
Nota 3: Punctajul se va acorda in functie de numarul de galerii, cu o lungime de minim 300 m fiecare, aferente unor tuneluri realizate prin excavatie in subteran, indiferent de numarul de contracte in care aceste lucrari de arta au fost realizate. 
Nota 4: Nu vor fi luate in considerare urmatoarele tipuri de galerii: galerii de urgenta/ de evacuare/edilitare/de legatura pietonale/ de legatura ce permit accesul auto/galerii de legatura intre galeriile tunelului.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Experience of Tunnel Design Engineer: Criterion description: Experience held in the position of Tunnel Design Engineer under contracts for drafting and/or updating and/or revising and/or completing feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of road transport infrastructure (motorway/express road/national road) and/or rail transport infrastructure (including metro) that included tunnel galleries executed by underground excavation, each with a minimum length of 300 m. The participation of the proposed expert in the position of Tunnel Design Engineer in contract(s) under which feasibility studies and/or technical designs were drafted and/or updated and/or revised and/or completed for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of road transport infrastructure (motorway/express road/national road) and/or rail transport infrastructure (including metro) that included tunnel galleries executed by underground excavation, each with a minimum length of 300 m, will be scored as follows:

- 2 galleries with a length of at least 300 m each: 2.5 points;
- 3 galleries with a length of at least 300 m each: 4 points;
- 4 or more galleries with a length of at least 300 m each: 5 points.

Note 1: Tenderers shall submit a Curriculum Vitae and any other relevant documents/recommendations issued by the Beneficiary (the final beneficiary of the contract) and/or the Employer for each contract presented, showing the elements necessary for awarding the score.
Note 2: For the purpose of awarding points, Technical Designs prepared under design-and-build contracts will also be taken into account.
Note 3: The score will be awarded according to the number of galleries, with a length of at least 300 m each, pertaining to tunnels executed by underground excavation, irrespective of the number of contracts in which these civil engineering works were carried out.
Note 4: The following types of galleries will not be taken into account: emergency/evacuation/utility/pedestrian connecting galleries/connecting galleries allowing vehicle access/cross-passages between the tunnel bores.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Experienta detinuta de INGINERUL PROIECTANT DE PODURI: Descriere criteriu: Experienta detinuta in pozitia de Inginer proiectant de poduri si/ sau Inginer proiectant structuri si/ sau Inginer Lucrari de Arta in contract/contracte in cadrul caruia/carora au fost elaborate si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau autostrazi si/sau drumuri expres care au inclus poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 300 metri fiecare., Participarea expertului propus in pozitia de Inginer proiectant de poduri si/ sau Inginer proiectant structuri si/ sau Inginer Lucrari de Arta in contract/contracte in caruia/cadrul carora au fost elaborate si/sau actualizate si/sau revizuite studii de fezabilitate si/ sau proiecte tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/ sau largire de drumuri nationale si/sau autostrazi si/sau drumuri expres care au inclus poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 300 metri fiecare, se va puncta astfel: 

2 poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 300 metri fiecare: 2,5 puncte; 
3 poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 300 metri fiecare: 4 puncte; 
4 sau mai multe poduri si/ sau pasaje si/ sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 300 metri fiecare: 5 puncte

Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune Anexa nr. 1 la Formularul nr. 4 "Curriculum Vitae" si orice alte documente relevante (fisa de post/contract de munca)/ recomandari emise de Beneficiar (Beneficiarul final al contractului) si/sau Angajator pentru fiecare contract prezentat, din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului.
Nota 2: In vederea acordarii punctajului vor fi luate in considerare si Proiectele Tehnice elaborate in cadrul unor contracte de proiectare si executie. 
Nota 3: Punctajul se va acorda in functie de numarul de poduri/pasaje/viaducte, cu o lungime de minim 300 metri fiecare, indiferent de numarul de contracte in care aceste lucrari de arta au fost realizate. 
Nota 4: In vederea acordarii punctajului se accepta si prezentarea unor contracte in cadrul carora expertul sa fi detinut pozitia de Inginer proiectant de poduri si/ sau Inginer proiectant structuri si/ sau Inginer Lucrari de Arta, de elaborare si/sau revizuire si/sau actualizare de Studii de Fezabilitate si/sau Proiecte Tehnice pentru constructie noua si/sau modernizare si/sau largire de poduri si/sau pasaje si/sau viaducte cu o lungime de minim 300 metri fiecare aferente unor drumuri nationale si/sau autostrazi si/sau drumuri expres.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Experience held by the BRIDGE DESIGN ENGINEER: Criterion description: Experience held in the position of Bridge Design Engineer and/or Structural Design Engineer and/or Engineer for Civil Engineering Structures in contract(s) under which feasibility studies and/or technical designs were prepared and/or updated and/or revised for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or motorways and/or express roads that included bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts, each with a length of at least 300 meters. The participation of the proposed expert in the position of Bridge Design Engineer and/or Structural Design Engineer and/or Engineer for Civil Engineering Structures in contract(s) under which feasibility studies and/or technical designs were prepared and/or updated and/or revised for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or motorways and/or express roads that included bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts, each with a length of at least 300 meters, will be scored as follows:

2 bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts, each with a length of at least 300 meters: 2.5 points;
3 bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts, each with a length of at least 300 meters: 4 points;
4 or more bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts, each with a length of at least 300 meters: 5 points.

Note 1: Tenderers shall submit Annex no. 1 to Form no. 4 “Curriculum Vitae” and any other relevant documents (job description/employment contract)/recommendations issued by the Beneficiary (the final beneficiary of the contract) and/or Employer for each contract presented, from which the elements necessary for awarding the score shall result.
Note 2: For the purpose of awarding the score, Technical Designs prepared under design-and-build contracts will also be considered.
Note 3: The score will be awarded according to the number of bridges/overpasses/viaducts, each with a length of at least 300 meters, regardless of the number of contracts in which these structures were carried out.
Note 4: For the purpose of awarding the score, it is also acceptable to present contracts under which the expert held the position of Bridge Design Engineer and/or Structural Design Engineer and/or Engineer for Civil Engineering Structures, for the drafting and/or revision and/or updating of Feasibility Studies and/or Technical Designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of bridges and/or overpasses and/or viaducts, each with a length of at least 300 meters, pertaining to national roads and/or motorways and/or express roads.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:
Cresterea incluziunii sociale: Descriere criteriu: Principalele obiective ale Autoritatii Contractante pentru asigurarea cresterii incluziunii sociale sunt axate pe Reducerea somajului local, facilitarea accesului la munca pentru persoanele cu dizabilitati si prevenirea discriminarii pe motive de rasa, relizgie, dizabilitate sau sex., Algoritm de calcul: 
1. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 5 puncte pentru ofertantii care isi asuma ca pe toata perioada executiei lucrarilor vor angaja un numar minim de 60 persoane incadrate ca someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din arealul obiectivului respectiv cu precadere din judetul Iasi, si judetele limitrofe Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui si Bacău. 
2. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 3 puncte pentru ofertantii care isi asuma ca pe toata perioada executiei lucrarilor vor angaja un numar minim de 30 persoane incadrate ca someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din arealul obiectivului respectiv cu precadere din judetul Iasi, si judetele limitrofe Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui, Bacău.
3. Autoritatea Contractanta acorda 1 punct pentru ofertantii care isi asuma ca pe toata perioada executiei lucrarilor vor angaja un numar minim de 15 persoane incadrate ca someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din arealul obiectivului respectiv cu precadere din judetul Iasi, si judetele limitrofe Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui si Bacău.
Incadrarea de someri/persoane cu dizabilitati din afara arealului specificat de autoritatea contractanta (alte judete decat cele mentionate), nu se puncteaza.
Nota 1: Ofertantii vor depune o Declaratie din care sa rezulte elementele necesare acordarii punctajului si modalitatea in care isi vor asigura accesul la aceste resurse.
Nota 2: Incadrarea de someri /personae cu dizabilitati din afara arealului specificat de Autoritatea Contractanta (alte judete decat cele mentionate), nu se punctează.
criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:
Increasing social inclusion: Criterion description: The main objectives of the Contracting Authority to ensure increased social inclusion are focused on reducing local unemployment, facilitating access to work for persons with disabilities, and preventing discrimination on grounds of race, religion, disability, or sex. Scoring algorithm:
1. The Contracting Authority awards 5 points to tenderers who undertake that, for the entire duration of the execution of the works, they will hire a minimum of 60 persons registered as unemployed and/or as persons with disabilities from the area of the respective objective, with priority from Iași County and the neighboring counties Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui, and Bacău.
2. The Contracting Authority awards 3 points to tenderers who undertake that, for the entire duration of the execution of the works, they will hire a minimum of 30 persons registered as unemployed and/or as persons with disabilities from the area of the respective objective, with priority from Iași County and the neighboring counties Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui, and Bacău.
3. The Contracting Authority awards 1 point to tenderers who undertake that, for the entire duration of the execution of the works, they will hire a minimum of 15 persons registered as unemployed and/or as persons with disabilities from the area of the respective objective, with priority from Iași County and the neighboring counties Neamț, Botoșani, Suceava, Vaslui, and Bacău.
The hiring of unemployed persons and/or persons with disabilities from outside the area specified by the Contracting Authority (counties other than those mentioned) is not scored.
Note 1: Tenderers shall submit a Declaration showing the elements necessary for awarding the points and the way in which they will ensure access to these resources.
Note 2: The hiring of unemployed persons and/or persons with disabilities from outside the area specified by the Contracting Authority (counties other than those mentioned) is not scored.

criteria_from_actual_contract_in_origina:

criteria_from_actual_contract_translated:

The participation of the proposed expert in the position of Project Manager and/or Project Director and/or Project Coordinator and/or Deputy Project Director and/or Deputy Project Manager and/or Deputy Project Coordinator within contracts for supervision of works execution and/or supervision of design and works execution and/or execution of works and/or design and execution of works for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or express roads and/or motorways will be scored as follows:
participation in 2 contracts: 3.5 points
participation in 3 contracts: 5 points
participation in 4 or more contracts: 7 points

Addition in section II.2.5) - Award criteria from the Instructions for Tenderers.

Experience of the Road Design Engineer: Criterion description: Experience held in the position of Road Design Engineer under contracts for the preparation and/or updating and/or revision of feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or express roads and/or motorways. The participation of the proposed expert in the position of Road Design Engineer under contracts for the preparation and/or updating and/or revision of feasibility studies and/or technical designs for new construction and/or modernization and/or widening of national roads and/or express roads and/or motorways will be scored as follows:
